sourceString: On February 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of COVID-19 demonstrated the desquamation of pneumocytes, hyaline membrane formation, and interstitial lymphocyte infiltration, and multinucleated syncytial cells in the lungs of a patient who died of the disease, consistent with the pathology of viral infection and ARDS and similar to that of SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: در ۱۸ فوریه سال ۲۰۲۰، اولین تجزیه و تحلیل پاتولوژیک کووید-19 نشان داد پوسته‌ریزی پنوموسیت‌ها، تشکیل غشای شیشه‌ای و نفوذ لنفوسیت بینابینی و سلول‌های سین سیشیال چندهسته‌ای در ریه‌های بیماری که به دلیل بیماری درگذشته است با آسیب‌شناسی عفونت ویروسی و ARDS سازگار بوده و شبیه به بیماران SARS و MERS است.
en-mt: On February 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of Covid-19 showed that pneumocyte desquamation, vitreous membrane formation, and interstitial lymphocyte and multinucleated syncytial cell infiltration in the lungs of a patient who died due to the disease were consistent with and similar to the pathology of viral infection and ARDS. to SARS and MERS patients.

sourceString: The detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA via reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) was used as the major criteria for the diagnosis of COVID-19.
targetString: تشخیص RNA مربوط به SARS-CoV-2 از طریق واکنش زنجیره‌ای پلیمراز-رونویسی معکوس (RT-PCR) به عنوان معیار اصلی تشخیص کووید-19 مورد استفاده قرار گرفت.
en-mt: The detection of RNA related to SARS-CoV-2 through reverse transcription-polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) was used as the main criterion for the diagnosis of Covid-19.

sourceString: However, due to the high false-negative rate, which may accelerate the epidemic, clinical manifestations started to be used for diagnosis (which no longer solely relied on RT-PCR) in China on February 13, 2020.
targetString: با این حال ، با توجه به نرخ منفی کاذب بالای این روش، که ممکن است اپیدمی را تسریع کند، در تاریخ ۱۳ فوریه سال ۲۰۲۰ استفاده از علائم بالینی (که دیگر فقط به RT-PCR متکی نبودند) برای تشخیص بیماری در چین آغاز شد.
en-mt: However, due to the high false negative rate of this method, which may accelerate the epidemic, on February 13, 2020, the use of clinical symptoms (no longer relying only on RT-PCR) to diagnose the disease began in China. .

sourceString: A similar situation also occurred with the diagnosis of SARS.
targetString: برای تشخیص SARS نیز وضعیت مشابهی رخ داده بود.
en-mt: A similar situation had occurred for the diagnosis of SARS.

sourceString: Therefore, a combination of disease history, clinical manifestations, laboratory tests, and radiological findings is essential and imperative for making an effective diagnosis.
targetString: بنابراین، ترکیبی از سابقه بیماری، علائم بالینی، تستهای آزمایشگاهی و یافته‌های رادیولوژیک برای داشتن یک تشخیص موثر، ضروری و الزامی است.
en-mt: Therefore, a combination of disease history, clinical symptoms, laboratory tests and radiological findings is necessary and mandatory to have an effective diagnosis.

sourceString: On February 14, 2020, the Feng Zhang group described a protocol of using the CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique to detect SARS-CoV-2, which detects synthetic SARS-CoV-2 RNA fragments at 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 copies per microliter of input) using a dipstick in less than an hour without requiring elaborate instrumentation.
targetString: در تاریخ ۱۴ فوریه ۲۰۲۰، گروه فنگ ژانگ پروتکلی با استفاده از روشهای شرلوک مبتنی بر CRISPR برای شناسایی SARS-CoV-2 پیشنهاد دادند، که موجب تشخیص قطعات RNA ترکیبی مربوط به SARS-CoV-2 در 20 × 10-18 mol/L تا 200 × 10-18 mol/L ‌شود (۱۰ تا ۱۰۰ کپی در هر میکرولیتر از موارد ورودی) که این کار با استفاده از یک نوار در کمتر از یک ساعت بدون نیاز به ابزارهای دقیق گران‌قیمت انجام می‌گیرد.
en-mt: On February 14, 2020, Feng Zhang's group proposed a protocol using CRISPR-based Sherlock methods to detect SARS-CoV-2, which detected recombinant RNA fragments related to SARS-CoV-2 at 20 × 10-18 mol/L. to 200 x 10-18 mol/L (10 to 100 copies per microliter of input), which can be done using a single strip in less than an hour without the need for expensive precision instruments.

sourceString: Hopefully, the new technique can dramatically enhance the sensitivity and convenience if verified in clinical samples.
targetString: این امیدواری وجود دارد که روش جدید اگر در نمونه های بالینی تایید شود بتواند به طرز چشمگیری موجب افزایش دقت و راحتی در آزمایش شود.
en-mt: There is hope that the new method, if confirmed in clinical samples, can significantly increase the accuracy and convenience of testing.

sourceString: Due to the lack of experience with the novel CoV, physicians can mainly provide supportive care to COVID-19 patients, while attempting a variety of therapies that have been used or proposed before for the treatment of other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and other viral diseases (Table ​(Table2).2).
targetString: با توجه به عدم تجربه در خصوص این نوع CoV جدید، پزشکان به طور عمده می‌توانند مراقبت‌های حمایتی به بیماران کووید-19 ارائه دهند، در حالی که درمان‌های مختلفی که برای بهبود سایر CoVها مانند SARS-CoV و MERS-CoV و سایر بیماریهای ویروسی استفاده می شود، پیشنهاد شده است (جدول ۲).۲).
en-mt: Due to the lack of experience with this new type of CoV, doctors can mainly provide supportive care to Covid-19 patients, while various treatments used to treat other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and other viral diseases It is suggested (Table 2).2).

sourceString: These therapies include current and potential treatments with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, Chinese medicine, and psychological support.
targetString: این درمان‌ها عبارتند از درمان‌های فعلی و بالقوه با داروهای ضد ویروس، داروهای سرکوب کننده سیستم ایمنی، استروئیدها، پلاسمای دریافتی از بیماران بهبود یافته، طب چینی و حمایت روانی.
en-mt: These treatments include current and potential treatments with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressive drugs, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, Chinese medicine, and psychological support.

sourceString: Even plasma from recovered patients was proposed to be used for treatment.
targetString: حتی پلاسمای دریافتی از بیماران بهبود یافته برای استفاده در درمان پیشنهاد شد.
en-mt: Even plasma received from recovered patients was suggested for use in treatment.

sourceString: Pharmaceutical companies are racing to develop antibodies and vaccines against the virus.
targetString: شرکت‌های دارویی در حال رقابت برای تولید پادتن و واکسن در برابر ویروس هستند.
en-mt: Pharmaceutical companies are competing to produce antibodies and vaccines against the virus.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 mainly attacks the lungs in the beginning and probably also attacks, to a lesser degree, other organs that express ACE2, such as the gastrointestinal system and the kidneys.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 عمدتاً در آغاز به ریه‌ها حمله می‌کند و احتمالا حملات ضعیف‌تری به سایر اعضا که دارای ACE2 هستند، مانند سیستم گوارش و کلیه‌ها داشته باشد.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 primarily attacks the lungs at first, and is likely to have weaker attacks on other organs that have ACE2, such as the digestive system and kidneys.

sourceString: Nevertheless, respiratory dysfunction and failure are the major threat to the patients and the major cause of death.
targetString: با این اوصاف، اختلال عملکرد و از کار افتادن سیستم تنفسی مهمترین خطر در کمین بیماران و علت اصلی مرگ افراد است.
en-mt: Having said that, dysfunction and failure of the respiratory system is the most important danger lurking in patients and the main cause of death.

sourceString: Thus, respiratory support is critical to relieve the symptoms and save lives and includes general oxygen therapy, high-flow oxygen, noninvasive ventilation, and invasive mechanical ventilation depending on the severity of the disease.
targetString: بنابراین، حمایت تنفسی برای تسکین علائم بیماری، حیاتی است و زندگی فرد را نجات می دهد که بسته به شدت بیماری می‌تواند شامل اکسیژن درمانی عمومی، اکسیژن با جریان بالا، ونتیلاتور غیر تهاجمی و ونتیلاتور مکانیکی تهاجمی باشد.
en-mt: Therefore, respiratory support is vital to relieve the symptoms of the disease and save a person's life, which, depending on the severity of the disease, can include general oxygen therapy, high-flow oxygen, non-invasive ventilator and invasive mechanical ventilator.

sourceString: Patients with severe respiratory symptoms have to be supported by extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), a modified cardiopulmonary bypass technique used for the treatment of life-threatening cardiac or respiratory failure.
targetString: بیمارانی که علائم تنفسی شدید دارند باید توسط اکسیژناسیون غشایی برون‌پیکری (ECMO) حمایت شوند، این روش یک تکنیک بای‌پس ریوی قلبی اصلاح شده است که برای درمان نارسایی قلبی یا تنفسی مورد استفاده قرار می گیرد.
en-mt: Patients with severe respiratory symptoms should be supported by extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), a modified cardiopulmonary bypass technique used to treat heart or respiratory failure.

sourceString: In addition, the maintenance of electrolyte balance, the prevention and treatment of secondary infection and septic shock, and the protection of the functions of the vital organs are also essential for SARS-CoV-2 patients.
targetString: علاوه بر این، حفظ تعادل الکترولیت، پیشگیری و درمان عفونت ثانویه و شوک سپتیک و حفاظت از عملکرد اعضای حیاتی نیز در بیماران مبتلا به SARS-CoV-2 ضروری است.
en-mt: In addition, maintenance of electrolyte balance, prevention and treatment of secondary infection and septic shock, and protection of vital organ function are also essential in patients with SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: It has been known that a cytokine storm results from an overreaction of the immune system in SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: مشخص شده است که طوفان سیتوکین از واکنش بیش از حد سیستم ایمنی بدن در بیماران مبتلا به SARS و MERS حاصل می‌شود.
en-mt: A cytokine storm has been found to result from an overreaction of the immune system in patients with SARS and MERS.

sourceString: Cytokine storm is a form of systemic inflammatory response featured by the release of a series of cytokines including TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, and MCP-1.
targetString: طوفان سیتوکین نوعی پاسخ التهابی سیستمیک است که ویژگی آن انتشار یک سری سیتوکین شامل TNFα ،IL-1β ،IL-2 ،IL-6 ،IFNα ،IFNβ ،IFNγ و MCP-1 می‌باشد.
en-mt: Cytokine storm is a systemic inflammatory response characterized by the release of a series of cytokines including TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ and MCP-1.

sourceString: These cytokines induce immune cells to release a vast number of free radicals which are the major cause of ARDS and multiple organ failure.
targetString: این سیتوکین به سلول‌های ایمنی القاء می‌کند که به انتشار تعداد زیادی رادیکال‌های آزاد بپردازند که علت اصلی ARDS و نارسایی چندعضوی است.
en-mt: This cytokine induces immune cells to release large amounts of free radicals, which are the main cause of ARDS and multiple organ failure.

sourceString: Immunosuppression is essential in the treatment of cytokine storms, especially in severe patients.
targetString: سرکوب سیستم ایمنی در درمان طوفانهای سیتوکین به ویژه در بیمارانی که وضعیت وخیمی دارند ضروری است.
en-mt: Immunosuppression is necessary in the treatment of cytokine storms, especially in critically ill patients.

sourceString: Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, have been used to treat cytokine storm.
targetString: کورتیکواستروئیدها و tocilizumab که یک آنتی‌بادی مونوکلونال ضد IL6 است برای درمان طوفان سیتوکین استفاده شده است.
en-mt: Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, have been used to treat cytokine storm.

sourceString: Other immunosuppression treatments for cytokine storm include the modulation of T cell-directed immune response; the blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC inhibitors.
targetString: سایر درمان‌ها برای سرکوب سیستم ایمنی به منظور جلوگیری از طوفان سیتوکین عبارتند از مدولاسیون پاسخ ایمنی هدایت شده با سلول‌های T؛ انسداد IFN-γ، IL-1 و TNF؛ مهار JAK؛ بلیناتومومب؛ سرکوبگر ارسال علائم سیتوکین ۴ و مهارکننده‌های HDAC.
en-mt: Other therapies for immunosuppression to prevent cytokine storms include modulation of the T-cell-directed immune response; blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1 and TNF; JAK inhibition; belinatumumab; Suppressor of cytokine signaling 4 and HDAC inhibitors.

sourceString: Steroids, as immunosuppressants, were widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: استروئیدها به عنوان داروهای سرکوب کننده سیستم ایمنی به طور گسترده‌ای در درمان SARS به منظور کاهش شدت آسیب التهابی استفاده می‌شد.
en-mt: Steroids as immunosuppressive drugs were widely used in the treatment of SARS in order to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.

sourceString: However, steroids at high dosages were not beneficial to severe lung injury in SARS and COVID-19 patients.
targetString: با این حال استفاده از استروئیدها در دوزهای بالا در حالت آسیب شدید به ریه در بیماران مبتلا به SARS و کووید-19 مفید نبود.
en-mt: However, the use of steroids in high doses was not beneficial in severe lung injury in patients with SARS and Covid-19.

sourceString: Instead, they may cause severe side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, dramatically affecting the prognosis.
targetString: بلکه ممکن است باعث عوارض جانبی شدید، به خصوص آواسکولار استئونکروز شده و به طور چشمگیری بر بهبود بیماری تاثیر منفی داشته باشد.
en-mt: Rather, it may cause severe side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, and have a significant negative effect on the recovery of the disease.

sourceString: Nevertheless, short courses of corticosteroids at low-to-moderate doses have been recommended to be used prudently for critically ill COVID-19 patients.
targetString: با این اوصاف، دوره های کوتاه استفاده از کورتیکواستروئیدها در دوزهای کم تا متوسط توصیه شده است که با احتیاط برای بیماران مبتلا به کووید-19 که در وضعیت بحرانی هستند مورد استفاده قرار گیرد.
en-mt: However, short courses of low- to moderate-dose corticosteroids are recommended to be used with caution in critically ill patients with COVID-19.

sourceString: At the time of writing, no effective antiviral therapy has been confirmed.
targetString: در زمان نگارش این مطلب، هیچ درمان موثر ضد ویروسی برای این بیماری تایید نشده است.
en-mt: At the time of writing, no effective antiviral treatment has been approved for this disease.

sourceString: However, intravenous administration with remdesivir, a nucleotide analog, has been found to be efficacious in an American patient with COVID-19.
targetString: با این حال، مشخص شده که دخالت داخل وریدی با remdesivir که یک آنالوگ نوکلئوتیدی است، در یک بیمار آمریکایی مبتلا به کووید-19 موثر واقع شده است.
en-mt: However, intravenous intervention with remdesivir, a nucleotide analog, was found to be effective in an American patient with covid-19.

sourceString: Remdesivir is a novel antiviral drug developed by Gilead initially for the treatment of diseases caused by Ebola and Marlburg viruses.
targetString: Remdesivir یک داروی ضد ویروس جدید است که توسط Gilead در ابتدا برای درمان بیماری‌های ناشی از ویروس‌های ابولا و Marlburg تولید شد.
en-mt: Remdesivir is a new antiviral drug developed by Gilead initially to treat diseases caused by the Ebola and Marlburg viruses.

sourceString: Later, remdesivir also demonstrated possible inhibition of other single stranded RNA viruses including MERS and SARS viruses.
targetString: بعدها مهار احتمالی سایر ویروس‌های RNA تک رشته‌ای از جمله ویروس‌های  MERS و SARS توسط remdesivir نشان داده شد.
en-mt: Later, remdesivir was shown to inhibit other single-stranded RNA viruses, including MERS and SARS.

sourceString: Based on these, Gilead has provided the compound to China to conduct a pair of trials on SARS-CoV-2-infected individuals, and the results are highly anticipated.
targetString: بر این اساس، Gilead ترکیب را به چین ارسال کرده است تا یک سری آزمایشات در افراد آلوده به SARS-CoV-2 انجام گیرد و نتایج بسیار امیدوار کننده بود.
en-mt: Accordingly, Gilead sent the compound to China for a series of tests on people infected with SARS-CoV-2, and the results were very promising.

sourceString: In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been suggested as potential therapies for patients with acute respiratory symptoms.
targetString: علاوه بر این baricitinb، interferon-α، lopinavir/ritonavir و ribavirin به عنوان درمان بالقوه برای بیماران مبتلا به علائم حاد تنفسی پیشنهاد شده است.
en-mt: In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been suggested as potential treatments for patients with acute respiratory symptoms.

sourceString: Diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, liver damage, and other adverse reactions can occur following combined therapy with lopinavir/ritonavir.
targetString: اسهال، حالت تهوع، استفراغ، آسیب کبدی و دیگر واکنش‌های جانبی می‌توانند پس از درمان ترکیبی با lopinavir/ritonavir رخ دهند.
en-mt: Diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, liver damage, and other adverse reactions can occur after combination therapy with lopinavir/ritonavir.

sourceString: The interaction of these treatments with other drugs used in the patients should be monitored carefully.
targetString: تداخل این درمان با سایر داروهای مورد استفاده در بیماران باید به دقت تحت نظارت قرار گیرد.
en-mt: The interaction of this treatment with other drugs used in patients should be carefully monitored.

sourceString: Plasma from recovered patients and antibody generation
targetString: پلاسمای دریافتی از بیماران بهبود یافته و تولید ﺁنتی‌بادی
en-mt: Plasma received from recovered patients and antibody production

sourceString: The collection of the blood from patients who recovered from a contagious disease to treat other patients suffering from the same disease or to protect healthy individuals from catching the disease has a long history.
targetString: گرفتن خون از بیمارانی که از یک بیماری واگیردار بهبود یافته‌اند تا با استفاده از آن به درمان سایر بیمارانی که از بیماری مشابهی رنج می‌برند کمک کنند یا از افراد سالم در برابر ابتلا به آن بیماری محافظت کنند، سابقه‌ای طولانی دارد.
en-mt: Taking blood from patients who have recovered from an infectious disease to help treat other patients suffering from the same disease or to protect healthy people from contracting that disease has a long history.

sourceString: Indeed, recovered patients often have a relatively high level of antibodies against the pathogen in their blood.
targetString: در واقع، بیمارانی که بهبود یافته‌اند اغلب در خون خود ﺁنتی‌بادی نسبتاً زیادی برای مقابله با عامل بیماری‌زا دارند.
en-mt: In fact, patients who recover often have relatively high levels of antibodies in their blood to fight the pathogen.

sourceString: Antibodies are an immunoglobulin (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight pathogens and other foreign objects and they recognize unique molecules in the pathogens and neutralize them directly.
targetString: ﺁنتی‌بادی‌ها ایمونوگلوبولینی (Ig) هستند که توسط لنفوسیت‌های B برای مبارزه با عوامل بیماری‌زا و سایر اشیا خارجی تولید می‌شوند و مولکول‌های منحصر به فرد را در پاتوژن‌ها تشخیص داده و ﺁنها را به طور مستقیم خنثی می‌کنند.
en-mt: Antibodies are immunoglobulins (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight pathogens and other foreign objects, and they recognize unique molecules in pathogens and directly neutralize them.

sourceString: Based on this, plasma was collected from the blood of a group of patients who recovered from COVID-19 and was injected into 10 seriously ill patients.
targetString: بر این اساس، پلاسما از خون گروهی از بیماران که از کووید-19 بهبود یافته بودند دریافت و به ۱۰ بیمار بدحال تزریق شد.
en-mt: Based on this, plasma was obtained from the blood of a group of patients who had recovered from Covid-19 and injected into 10 sick patients.

sourceString: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, accompanied by reduced inflammation and viral loads and improved oxygen saturation in the blood.
targetString: علائم بیماری ﺁنها در عرض ۲۴ ساعت بهبود یافت که با کاهش التهاب و بار ویروسی و بهبود اشباع اکسیژن در خون همراه بود.
en-mt: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, which was accompanied by a decrease in inflammation and viral load and an improvement in blood oxygen saturation.

sourceString: However, verification and clarification are necessary to propose the method for large-scale use before specific therapies are not yet developed.
targetString: با این حال قبل از اینکه درمان‌های مشخصی ارائه شود، استفاده از این روش در مقیاس بزرگ نیاز به تأیید و شفاف‌سازی دارد.
en-mt: However, large-scale use of this method needs to be validated and clarified before specific treatments can be offered.

sourceString: In addition, given the therapeutic effects, some disadvantages associated with the plasma should be considered carefully.
targetString: علاوه بر این، با توجه به اثرات درمانی، برخی معایب مرتبط با پلاسما باید به دقت در نظر گرفته شود.
en-mt: In addition, considering the therapeutic effects, some disadvantages associated with plasma should be carefully considered.

sourceString: For example, antibodies can overstimulate the immune response and cause cytokine release syndrome, which is potentially a life-threatening toxicity.
targetString: به عنوان مثال، ﺁنتی‌بادی‌ها می‌توانند پاسخ ایمنی را بیش‌ از حد تحریک کنند و سندرم آزادسازی سیتوکین ایجاد کنند که به‌طور بالقوه یک سم تهدیدکننده حیات است.
en-mt: For example, antibodies can overstimulate the immune response and cause cytokine release syndrome, a potentially life-threatening toxin.

sourceString: The concentration of antibodies in the blood is usually low, and the demand for the plasma is large to treat critically ill patients.
targetString: غلظت پادتن در خون معمولا کم بوده و تقاضا برای پلاسما برای درمان بیماران بسیار زیاد است.
en-mt: The concentration of antibody in the blood is usually low and the demand for plasma to treat patients is very high.

sourceString: It is difficult to develop and produce specific antibodies rapidly enough to fight against a global epidemic.
targetString: تهیه و تولید سریع پادتن مخصوص که برای مبارزه با اپیدمی جهانی کافی باشد دشوار است.
en-mt: It is difficult to prepare and quickly produce specific antibodies that are sufficient to fight a global epidemic.

sourceString: Thus, it is more critical and practical to isolate B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic codes encoding effective antibodies or screen for effective antibodies against essential proteins of the virus.
targetString: بنابراین، جداسازی سلول‌های B از بیماران بهبودیافته و شناسایی کد‌های ژنتیکی کدکننده پادتن‌ها یا غربال پادتن‌‌های موثر در برابر پروتئین‌های اصلی ویروس، مهم تر و کاربردی تر است.
en-mt: Therefore, it is more important and practical to isolate B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic codes encoding antibodies or the screening of effective antibodies against the main proteins of the virus.

sourceString: This way, we can readily scale up the production of the antibodies.
targetString: به این ترتیب، می‌توانیم تولید پادتن‌ها را به سرعت افزایش دهیم.
en-mt: In this way, we can rapidly increase the production of antibodies.

sourceString: TCM has been used to treat a variety of diseases in China for thousands of years.
targetString: TCM هزاران سال است که برای درمان انواع بیماری‌ها در چین استفاده می‌شود.
en-mt: TCM has been used to treat a variety of ailments in China for thousands of years.

sourceString: However, its effects largely rely on a combination of multiple components in a formula that varies depending on the diagnosis of a disease based on the theories of TCM.
targetString: با این حال، اثرات ﺁن تا حد زیادی به ترکیب اجزای مختلف در فرمول وابسته است که بسته به تشخیص بیماری بر اساس تئوری‌های TCM با هم فرق دارد.
en-mt: However, its effects largely depend on the composition of various components in the formula, which differ depending on the diagnosis of the disease based on TCM theories.

sourceString: Most of the effective components remain unknown or are vague as it is difficult to extract and verify such components or their optimal combinations.
targetString: اکثر اجزای مؤثر آن هنوز ناشناخته یا مبهم هستند، زیرا استخراج و تأیید این اجزاء یا ترکیب بهینه ﺁنها دشوار است.
en-mt: Most of its effective components are still unknown or obscure, because it is difficult to extract and verify these components or their optimal combination.

sourceString: Currently, due to the lack of effective and specific therapy for COVID-19, TCM has become one of the major alternative treatments for patients with light to moderate symptoms or for those who have recovered from severe stages.
targetString: در حال حاضر، TCM به دلیل نبود درمان موثر و مشخص برای کووید-19، به یکی از روش‌های درمانی مهم برای بیماران دارای علائم خفیف یا بیماران با علائم متوسط یا کسانی که از مراحل سخت بهبود یافته‌اند، تبدیل شده است.
en-mt: At present, TCM has become one of the important treatment methods for patients with mild symptoms or patients with moderate symptoms or those who have recovered from severe stages due to the lack of effective and specific treatment for Covid-19.

sourceString: For example, Shu Feng Jie Du capsules and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules were found to be effective for COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: به عنوان مثال کپسول‌های Shu Feng Jie Du و Lian Hua Qing Wen در درمان کووید-19 موثر تشخیص داده شدند.
en-mt: For example, Shu Feng Jie Du and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules were found to be effective in treating covid-19.

sourceString: Top cure rates in the treatment of COVID-19 patients were observed in several provinces in China that used TCM in 87% of their patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), and Hunan (50%), whereas Hubei province, which used TCM in only approximately 30% of its COVID-19 patients, had the lowest cure rate (13%).
targetString: بیشترین میزان درمان در بیماران کووید-19 در چند استان چین مشاهده شد که در آنها برای ۸۷٪ بیماران از TCM استفاده ‌کردند، از جمله در گانسو (۶۳.۷٪)، نینگشیا (۵۰٪) و هونان (۵۰٪). در استان هوبی که تنها ۳۰ درصد از بیماران کووید-19 از TCM استفاده می‌کردند، کمترین میزان درمان (۱۳٪) مشاهده شد.
en-mt: The highest rate of treatment in Covid-19 patients was observed in several Chinese provinces where TCM was used for 87% of patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%) and Hunan (50%). In Hubei province, where only 30% of Covid-19 patients used TCM, the lowest treatment rate (13%) was observed.

sourceString: However, this is quite a rough comparison as many other impact factors such as the number and severity of the patients should be included in the evaluation.
targetString: با این حال، این مقایسه کاملاً درستی نیست، زیرا عوامل بسیاری مانند تعداد و شدت بیماران باید در ارزیابی لحاظ شوند.
en-mt: However, this comparison is not completely accurate, as many factors such as the number and severity of patients must be considered in the evaluation.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and coworkers published a study to compare western medicine (WM) treatment alone with combined treatment of WM and TCM.
targetString: در ۱۸ فوریه سال ۲۰۲۰، Boli Zhang و همکارانش مطالعه‌ای برای مقایسه درمان غربی (WM) به تنهایی و درمان ترکیبی WM و TCM منتشر کردند.
en-mt: On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and colleagues published a study comparing Western medicine (WM) alone and combined treatment of WM and TCM.

sourceString: They found that the times needed for body temperature recovery, symptom disappearance, and hospitalization were remarkably shorter in the WM+TCM group than in the WM only group.
targetString: آنها دریافتند که زمان مورد نیاز برای بازیابی دمای بدن، ناپدید شدن علائم و بستری بودن در گروهی که با WM+TCM درمان شدند، بطور قابل ملاحظه‌ای کوتاهتر از گروهی بود که فقط با WM تحت درمان قرار گرفتند.
en-mt: They found that the time required for recovery of body temperature, disappearance of symptoms, and hospitalization was significantly shorter in the group treated with WM+TCM than in the group treated with WM alone.

sourceString: Most impressively, the rate for symptomatic worsening (from light to severe) was remarkably lower for the WM+TCM group than for the WM only group (7.4% versus 46.2%) and the mortality was lower in the WM+TCM group than WM only group (8.8% versus 39%).
targetString: شگفت‌آورتر اینکه سرعت وخیم تر شدن نشانه‌های بیماری (از خفیف به شدید) در گروه WM+TCM نسبت به گروه WM کمتر بود (۷.۴٪ در مقابل ۴۶.۲٪) و میزان مرگ و میر در گروه WM+TCM نسبت به گروه WM کمتر بود (۸.۸٪ در مقابل ۳۹٪).
en-mt: More surprisingly, the rate of worsening of disease symptoms (from mild to severe) was lower in the WM+TCM group compared to the WM group (7.4% vs. 46.2%) and the mortality rate in the WM+TCM group compared to the control group. WM was lower (8.8% vs. 39%).

sourceString: Nevertheless, the efficacy and safety of TCM still await more well-controlled trials at larger scales and in more centers.
targetString: با این وجود، کارایی و ایمنی TCM هنوز در انتظار آزمایشات بهتر کنترل شده در مقیاس‌های بزرگتر و مراکز بیشتر است.
en-mt: Nevertheless, the efficacy and safety of TCM still await better controlled trials on larger scales and more centers.

sourceString: It would also be intriguing to characterize the mechanism of actions and clarify the effective components of TCM treatments or their combinations if possible.
targetString: همچنین تعیین سازوکار عمل و مشخص کردن اجزای موثر روش درمان TCM یا ترکیبات ﺁنها در صورت امکان، موضوعی است که کنجکاوی دانشمندان را برانگیخته است.
en-mt: Also, determining the mechanism of action and specifying the effective components of the TCM treatment method or their combinations, if possible, is a subject that has aroused the curiosity of scientists.

sourceString: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 mostly experience great fear of the highly contagious and even fatal disease, and quarantined people also experience boredom, loneliness, and anger.
targetString: بیماران مشکوک یا مبتلایان تأیید شده کووید-19 اغلب ترس زیادی از این بیماری بسیار واگیردار و حتی کشنده دارند و افراد قرنطینه شده نیز دچار کسلی، تنهایی و عصبانیت می‌شوند.
en-mt: Suspected or confirmed patients of Covid-19 often have a great fear of this highly contagious and even fatal disease, and quarantined people also experience boredom, loneliness and anger.

sourceString: Furthermore, symptoms of the infection such as fever, hypoxia, and cough as well as adverse effects of the treatments such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to more anxiety and mental distress.
targetString: علاوه بر این، نشانه‌های این عفونت نظیر تب، هیپوکسی (کمبود اکسيژن در بافت‌هاى بدن)، سرفه و عوارض جانبی درمان مانند بی خوابی ناشی از کورتیکواستروئید می‌تواند منجر به تشویش و اضطراب ذهنی بیشتر شود.
en-mt: In addition, the symptoms of this infection such as fever, hypoxia (lack of oxygen in body tissues), cough, and side effects of treatment such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to more anxiety and mental anxiety.

sourceString: In the early phase of the SARS outbreak, a range of psychiatric morbidities including persistent depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicidality were reported.
targetString: در مرحله اول شیوع SARS، انواع عوارض روانپزشکی شامل افسردگی شدید، اضطراب، حملات عصبی، هیجانات روانی- حرکتی، علائم روانی، هذیان و حتی خودکشی گزارش شده است.
en-mt: In the first stage of SARS outbreak, a variety of psychiatric complications including severe depression, anxiety, nervous attacks, psychomotor emotions, psychological symptoms, delusions and even suicide have been reported.

sourceString: Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as a part of the public health responses to the COVID-19 outbreak, can make people more anxious and guilty about the effects of the contagion, quarantine, and stigma on their families and friends.
targetString: ردیابی تماس بصورت الزامی و قرنطینه، به عنوان بخشی از روش سیستم سلامت عمومی برای مقابله با شیوع ویروس کووید-19، می‌تواند افراد را نسبت به اثرات سرایت، قرنطینه و بدنام شدن در میان خانواده و دوستانشان مضطرب و مقصر سازد.
en-mt: Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as part of the public health system's approach to dealing with the spread of the Covid-19 virus, can make people feel anxious and guilty about the effects of contagion, quarantine, and stigma among their family and friends.

sourceString: Thus, mental health care should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected individuals, and people in contact with them as well as the general public who are in need.
targetString: از این رو، مراقبت‌های روان درمانی باید برای بیماران کووید-19، افراد مشکوک، افراد در تماس با ﺁنها و همچنین عموم مردم نیازمند مهیا شود.
en-mt: Hence, psychotherapeutic care should be provided to the Covid-19 patients, suspected persons, people in contact with them, as well as the general public in need.

sourceString: The psychological support should include the establishment of multidisciplinary mental health teams, clear communications with regular and accurate updates about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other.
targetString: حمایت روانی باید شامل ایجاد تیم‌های بهداشت روانی از رشته‌های مختلف، ارتباطات شفاف با به‌روزرسانی‌های منظم و دقیق درباره شیوع SARS-CoV-2 و طرحهای درمانی و استفاده از وسایل الکترونیکی حرفه‌ای و برنامه‌های کاربردی برای جلوگیری از تماس نزدیک با یکدیگر باشد.
en-mt: Psychological support should include the establishment of multidisciplinary mental health teams, clear communication with regular and detailed updates on the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans, and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other.

sourceString: Effective vaccines are essential for interrupting the chain of transmission from animal reservoirs and infected humans to susceptible hosts and are often complementary to antiviral treatment in the control of epidemics caused by emerging viruses.
targetString: واکسنهای اثربخش برای قطع زنجیره انتقال از جمعیت دامها و انسانهای ﺁلوده به میزبانهای مستعد لازم هستند و غالباً به عنوان روش مکمل برای درمان ضد ویروسی در کنترل بیماریهای واگیردار ناشی از ویروسهای در حال ظهور مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرند.
en-mt: Effective vaccines are needed to break the chain of transmission from infected livestock and human populations to susceptible hosts and are often used as an adjunct to antiviral therapy in the control of infectious diseases caused by emerging viruses.

sourceString: Efforts have been made to develop S protein-based vaccines to generate long-term and potent neutralizing antibodies and/or protective immunity against SARS-CoV.
targetString: تلاش‌هایی برای ساخت واکسن‌ها بر پایه پروتئین S برای تولید پادتن‌های خنثی‌کننده قوی و ماندگار و یا ایمنی حفاظتی علیه SARS-CoV انجام شده است.
en-mt: Efforts have been made to develop vaccines based on the S protein to generate strong and long-lasting neutralizing antibodies or protective immunity against SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Live-attenuated vaccines have been evaluated in animal models for SARS.
targetString: واکسن‌های زنده تضعیف شده در مدل‌های حیوانی برای SARS مورد ارزیابی قرار گرفته‌اند.
en-mt: Live attenuated vaccines have been evaluated in animal models for SARS.

sourceString: However, the in vivo efficacy of these vaccine candidates in elderly individuals and lethal-challenge models and their protection against zoonotic virus infection have yet to be determined before a clinical study is initiated.
targetString: با این حال، تاثیر این واکسن‌ها در افراد سالمند و مدل‌های سخت مهلک و حفاظت ﺁنها در برابر عفونت‌های ویروسی مشترک بین انسان و حیوان باید قبل از شروع مطالعه بالینی تعیین شود.
en-mt: However, the effectiveness of these vaccines in elderly subjects and severe lethality models and their protection against common human-animal viral infections should be determined before starting a clinical study.

sourceString: This is probably because SARS died down 17 years ago and no new case has been reported since.
targetString: این موضوع احتمالاً به این دلیل است که سارس ۱۷ سال پیش ریشه‌کن شده و از ﺁن زمان تاکنون هیچ مورد جدیدی گزارش نشده است.
en-mt: This is probably because SARS was eradicated 17 years ago and no new cases have been reported since then.

sourceString: In contrast, sporadic cases and clusters of MERS continue to occur in the Middle East and spread to other regions owing to the persistence of zoonotic sources in endemic areas.
targetString: در مقابل، موارد و خوشه‌های پراکنده MERS در خاورمیانه همچنان دیده می‌شوند و به دلیل وجود منابع انتقال از حیوان به انسان در مناطق بومی، به سایر مناطق گسترش می‌یابند.
en-mt: In contrast, sporadic cases and clusters of MERS continue to occur in the Middle East and spread to other regions due to the presence of sources of animal-to-human transmission in endemic areas.

sourceString: Vaccination strategies have been developed for MERS by using inactivated virus, DNA plasmids, viral vectors, nanoparticles, virus-like particles and recombinant protein subunits and some have been evaluated in animal models.
targetString: راهبردهای واکسیناسیون برای MERS با استفاده از ویروس غیرفعال، پلاسمید DNA، ناقل‌های ویروسی، نانوذرات، ذرات شبه ویروس و زیرواحدهای پروتئین نوترکیب ارائه شده و برخی از ﺁنها در مدل‌های حیوانی ارزیابی شده است.
en-mt: Vaccination strategies for MERS using inactivated virus, plasmid DNA, viral vectors, nanoparticles, virus-like particles and recombinant protein subunits have been proposed and some of them have been evaluated in animal models.

sourceString: The development of a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 for non-immune individuals is an urgent and critical task for controlling the ongoing epidemic.
targetString: تولید واکسنی ایمن و مؤثر علیه SARS-CoV-2 برای افراد غیرایمن، وظیفه‌ای ضروری و حیاتی برای کنترل اپیدمی است.
en-mt: Producing a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 for non-immune people is a necessary and vital task to control the epidemic.

sourceString: However, it is challenging to overcome the difficulty because of the long period of time (averaged 18 months) needed for vaccine development and the dynamic variations of CoVs.
targetString: با این حال، غلبه بر این مشکل به دلیل دوره طولانی که برای تولید واکسن لازم است (بطور میانگین ۱۸ ماه) و تغییرات دینامیک گونه‌های مختلف CoV دشوار است.
en-mt: However, this problem is difficult to overcome due to the long period required for vaccine development (on average 18 months) and the dynamic changes of different CoV strains.

sourceString: As a novel disease, COVID-19 has just started to manifest its full clinical course throughout thousands of patients.
targetString: کووید-19 به عنوان یک بیماری جدید، نشان دادن دوره کامل بالینی را در بین هزاران بیمار تازه شروع کرده است.
en-mt: As a new disease, Covid-19 has just begun to show a full clinical course in thousands of patients.

sourceString: In most cases, patients can recover gradually without sequelae.
targetString: در اکثر موارد، بیماران به تدریج و بدون بروز عوارض بهبود می‌یابند.
en-mt: In most cases, patients recover gradually without complications.

sourceString: However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 is also associated with high morbidity and mortality in patients with severe cases.
targetString: با این حال، همانند SARS و MERS، ویروس کووید-19 نیز با عوارض و مرگ و میر بالا در بیماران مبتلا به موارد حاد مرتبط است.
en-mt: However, like SARS and MERS, the Covid-19 virus is also associated with high morbidity and mortality in patients with acute cases.

sourceString: Therefore, building a prognosis model for the disease is essential for health-care agencies to prioritize their services, especially in resource-constrained areas.
targetString: از این رو، ایجاد یک مدل پیش‌‌بینی کننده جریان بیماری، برای سازمان‌های بهداشتی و درمانی ضروری است تا خدمات خود را به ‌ویژه در مناطق دارای محدودیت امکانات، اولویت‌بندی کنند.
en-mt: Therefore, creating a predictive model of disease flow is necessary for healthcare organizations to prioritize their services, especially in areas with limited facilities.

sourceString: Based on clinical studies reported thus far, the following factors may affect or be associated with the prognosis of COVID-19 patients (Table ​(Table33):
targetString: بر اساس مطالعات کلینیکی که تاکنون گزارش شده است، عوامل زیر می‌توانند بر پیش‌بینی جریان بیماران کووید-19 اثر بگذارند (جدول ​۳۳):
en-mt: Based on the clinical studies that have been reported so far, the following factors can affect the prediction of the flow of Covid-19 patients (Table 33):

sourceString: Age: Age was the most important factor for the prognosis of SARS, which is also true for COVID-19.
targetString: سن: سن مهمترین عامل پیش‌بینی جریان SARS بود که برای کووید-19 نیز صادق است.
en-mt: Age: Age was the most important predictor of SARS, which is also true for Covid-19.

sourceString: COVID-19 mainly happened at the age of 30-65 with 47.7% of those patients being over 50 in a study of 8,866 cases as described above.
targetString: کووید-19 بطور عمده در سنین ۳۰ تا ۶۵ سالگی رخ می‌دهد؛ در مطالعه‌ای که بر روی ۸،۸۶۶ مورد انجام گرفت مشخص شد ۴۷.۴٪ بیماران بالای ۵۰ سال سن داشتند.
en-mt: Covid-19 mainly occurs between the ages of 30 and 65; In a study that was conducted on 8,866 cases, it was found that 47.4% of patients were over 50 years old.

sourceString: Patients who required intensive care were more likely to have underlying comorbidities and complications and were significantly older than those who did not (at the median age of 66 versus 51), suggesting age as a prognostic factor for the outcome of COVID-19 patients.
targetString: بیمارانی که نیاز به مراقبت‌های ویژه داشتند، بیشتر دارای عوارض و ناهنجاری‌های زمینه‌ای بودند و سن ﺁنها بیش از کسانی بود که به مراقبت‌های ویژه نیاز نداشتند (سن متوسط گروه اول ۶۶ و سن متوسط گروه دوم۵۱ سال بود). این امر نشان می دهد که سن به عنوان یک عامل پیش‌بینی کننده در جریان بیماری و تعیین نتیجه در بیماران کووید-19 است.
en-mt: Patients who needed special care had more underlying complications and abnormalities and were older than those who did not need special care (the average age of the first group was 66 and the average age of the second group was 51). This shows that age is a predictive factor in the course of the disease and determining the outcome in covid-19 patients.

sourceString: Sex: SARS-CoV-2 has infected more men than women (0.31/100,000 versus 0.27/100,000), as described above.
targetString: جنسیت: SARS-CoV-2 بیشتر مردان را مبتلا می‌کند تا زنان را (0.31/100،000 در مقابل 0.27/100،000)، همانطور که در بالا توضیح داده شد.
en-mt: Gender: SARS-CoV-2 affects more men than women (0.31/100,000 vs. 0.27/100,000), as described above.

sourceString: Comorbidities and complications: Patients with COVID-19 who require intensive care are more likely to suffer from acute cardiac injury and arrhythmia.
targetString: بیماریهای قبلی و عوارض: بیماران مبتلا به کووید-19 که نیاز به مراقبت‌های ویژه دارند با احتمال بیشتری دچار ﺁسیب حاد قلبی و ﺁریتمی بودند.
en-mt: Previous diseases and complications: Patients with covid-19 who need special care were more likely to have acute heart damage and arrhythmia.

sourceString: Cardiac events were also the main reason for death in SARS patients.
targetString: رویدادهای قلبی دلیل اصلی مرگ بیماران SARS نیز بود.
en-mt: Cardiac events were also the leading cause of death in SARS patients.

sourceString: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 can also bind to ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, which might lead to liver dysfunctions in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: گزارش شده است که SARS-CoV-2 می‌تواند به کولانژیوسیت‌های ACE۲-مثبت نیز متصل شود و منجر به اختلال کبدی در بیماران کووید-19 شود.
en-mt: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 can also bind to ACE2-positive cholangiocytes and lead to liver dysfunction in Covid-19 patients.

sourceString: It is worth noting that age and underlying disease are strongly correlated and might interfere with each other.
targetString: لازم به ذکر است که سن و بیماری‌های زمینه‌ای به‌شدت با یکدیگر همبسته‌اند و ممکن است با یکدیگر تداخل داشته باشند.
en-mt: It should be noted that age and underlying diseases are strongly related to each other and may interfere with each other.

sourceString: Abnormal laboratory findings: The C-reactive protein (CRP) level in blood reflects the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and has been proposed to be a potential prognostic factor for disease, response to therapy, and ultimate recovery.
targetString: یافته‌های ﺁزمایشگاهی غیرطبیعی: سطح پروتئین واکنشی C در خون نشان‌دهنده شدت التهاب یا ﺁسیب در بافت است و پیشنهاد شده است که به عنوان یک فاکتور بالقوه برای بیماری، پاسخ به درمان و بهبودی نهایی باشد.
en-mt: Abnormal laboratory findings: The level of C-reactive protein in the blood indicates the severity of inflammation or tissue damage and has been suggested as a potential factor for disease, response to treatment, and eventual recovery.

sourceString: The correlation of CRP level to the severity and prognosis of COVID-19 has also been proposed.
targetString: همچنین همبستگی میزان CRP با شدت و پیش‌بینی جریان بیماری کووید-19 پیشنهاد شده است.
en-mt: Also, the correlation of CRP level with the severity and prediction of the course of the Covid-19 disease has been suggested.

sourceString: In addition, elevated lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and creatine kinase (CK) may also help predict the outcome.
targetString: علاوه بر این افزایش میزان لاکتات دهیدروژناز (LDH)، ﺁسپارتات ﺁمینوترانسفراز (AST)، ﺁلانین ﺁمینوترانسفراز (ALT) و کراتین کیناز (CK) نیز می‌توانند در پیش‌بینی نتایج کمک کنند.
en-mt: In addition, the increase in the amount of lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT) and creatine kinase (CK) can also help in predicting the results.

sourceString: These enzymes are expressed extensively in multiple organs, especially in the heart and liver, and are released during tissue damage.
targetString: این ﺁنزیم‌ها به طور گسترده‌ای در چندین اندام، به‌ویژه در قلب و کبد خود را نشان می‌دهند و در اثر ﺁسیب‌ به بافت ﺁزاد می‌شوند.
en-mt: These enzymes are widely expressed in several organs, especially in the heart and liver, and are released as a result of tissue damage.

sourceString: Thus, they are traditional markers for heart or liver dysfunctions.
targetString: از این رو، به عنوان نشانه‌های سنتی اختلال‌های قلبی یا کبدی می‌باشند.
en-mt: Therefore, they are traditional signs of heart or liver disorders.

sourceString: Major clinical symptoms: Chest radiography and temporal progression of clinical symptoms should be considered together with the other issues for the prediction of outcomes and complications of COVID-19.
targetString: علائم بالینی اصلی: برای پیش‌بینی نتایج و عوارض کووید-19، رادیوگرافی قفسه سینه و پیشرفت زمانی علائم بالینی بایستی همراه با سایر مسائل در نظر گرفته شود.
en-mt: Main clinical signs: To predict the outcomes and complications of covid-19, chest radiography and the time progression of clinical signs should be considered along with other issues.

sourceString: Use of steroids: As described above, steroids are immunosuppressant commonly used as an adjunctive therapy for infectious diseases to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: استفاده از استروئید: همان طور که در بالا گفته شد، استروئیدها، سرکوب کننده سیستم ایمنی هستند که معمولا به‌عنوان یک روش درمانی برای بیماری‌های عفونی به‌منظور کاهش شدت ﺁسیب التهابی مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرند.
en-mt: Steroid use: As mentioned above, steroids are immunosuppressants that are usually used as a treatment method for infectious diseases in order to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.

sourceString: Since a high dosage of corticosteroids was widely used in severe SARS patients, many survivors suffered from avascular osteonecrosis with life-long disability and poor life quality.
targetString: از ﺁنجا که دوز بالای کورتیکواستروئیدها بطور گسترده در بیماران مبتلا به SARS استفاده می‌شد، بسیاری از افراد بهبود یافته از بیماری استئونکروز عروقی با ناتوانی مادام العمر و کاهش کیفیت زندگی رنج می‌برند.
en-mt: Since high-dose corticosteroids were widely used in patients with SARS, many recovered patients suffered from vascular osteonecrosis with lifelong disability and reduced quality of life.

sourceString: Thus, if needed, steroids should be used at low dosage and for a short time in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: بنابراین در صورت نیاز، استروئید باید با دوز پایین و به مدت کوتاه در بیماران کووید-19 مورد استفاده قرار گیرد.
en-mt: Therefore, if needed, steroids should be used with a low dose and for a short period of time in Covid-19 patients.

sourceString: Mental stress: As described above, during the COVID-19 outbreak many patients have suffered from extraordinary stress as they often endured long periods of quarantine and extreme uncertainty and witnessed the death of close family members and fellow patients.
targetString: استرس روانی: همانطور که در بالا توضیح داده شد، از زمان شیوع کووید-19 بسیاری از بیماران از استرس فوق‌العاده رنج می‌برند، چرا که اغلب مدت زمان طولانی قرنطینه هستند و دچار عدم اطمینان شدید شده‌اند و شاهد مرگ اعضای نزدیک خانواده و بیماران هم‌اتاقی خود بوده‌اند.
en-mt: Psychological stress: As explained above, since the outbreak of Covid-19, many patients are suffering from extreme stress, as they are often quarantined for long periods of time, experiencing great uncertainty and witnessing the death of close family members and fellow patients. have been.

sourceString: It is imperative to provide psychological counseling and long-term support to help these patients recover from the stress and return to normal life.
targetString: ارائه مشاوره روانی و حمایت دراز مدت برای کمک به بهبود این بیماران و رهایی از استرس و بازگشت به زندگی عادی ضروری است.
en-mt: Providing psychological counseling and long-term support is necessary to help these patients recover and get rid of stress and return to normal life.

sourceString: According to demographic studies so far, COVID-19 seems to have different epidemiological features from SARS.
targetString: با توجه به مطالعات جمعیت شناختی که تاکنون صورت گرفته، به نظر می‌رسد که ویژگی های اپیدمیولوژیک کووید-19 با SARS فرق داشته باشد.
en-mt: According to the demographic studies that have been done so far, it seems that the epidemiological characteristics of Covid-19 are different from SARS.

sourceString: In addition to replicating in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can efficiently replicate in the upper respiratory tract and causes mild or no symptoms in the early phase of infection, similar to other CoVs that cause common colds.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 علاوه بر تکثیر در دستگاه تنفسی پایینی می‌تواند به طور موثری در دستگاه تنفسی فوقانی تکثیر شده و در مرحله اول عفونت، علایم خفیف یا ناچیزی داشته باشد و مشابه سایر CoVها که باعث سرماخوردگی معمولی می‌شوند باشد.
en-mt: In addition to replicating in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can effectively replicate in the upper respiratory tract and have mild or negligible symptoms in the first stage of infection, similar to other CoVs that cause the common cold.

sourceString: Therefore, infected patients at the early phase or incubation period can produce a large amount of virus during daily activities, causing great difficulty for the control of the epidemic.
targetString: از این رو، بیماران مبتلا در مرحله اول یا دوره نهفتگی می‌توانند در طی فعالیت‌های روزانه ویروس‌های فراوانی تولید کنند که این موضوع می‌تواند کنترل این اپیدمی را سخت کند.
en-mt: Therefore, infected patients in the first stage or incubation period can produce many viruses during daily activities, which can make it difficult to control this epidemic.

sourceString: However, the transmission of SARS-CoV was considered to occur when the patients are severely ill, while most transmission did not happen at the early phase.
targetString: با این حال، انتقال SARS-CoV هنگامی که بیماران به شدت بیمار بودند رخ می‌داد و در مرحله اولیه بیماری، انتقال رخ نمی‌داد.
en-mt: However, transmission of SARS-CoV occurred when patients were critically ill and transmission did not occur during the early stage of the disease.

sourceString: Thus, the current outbreak of COVID-19 is much more severe and difficult to control than the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: از این رو، شیوع کووید-19 بسیار شدیدتر از شیوع SARS است و کنترل آن مشکل‌تر است.
en-mt: Hence, the outbreak of Covid-19 is much more severe than the outbreak of SARS and it is more difficult to control.

sourceString: Great efforts are currently underway in China including the lockdown of Wuhan and surrounding cities and continuous quarantine of almost the entire population in hopes of interrupting the transmission of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: در حال حاضر تلاش‌های زیادی در چین در جریان است، از جمله ممنوعیت خروج از منازل در شهر ووهان و شهرهای اطراف و قرنطینه کردن مداوم تقریباً کل جمعیت به امید قطع زنجیره انتقال SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: Many efforts are currently underway in China, including a curfew in the city of Wuhan and surrounding cities and the continuous quarantine of almost the entire population in hopes of breaking the chain of transmission of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Although these actions have been dramatically damaging the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new patients is declining, indicating the slowdown of the epidemic.
targetString: گرچه این اقدامات به شدت به اقتصاد و سایر بخش‌های کشور ﺁسیب رسانده است، اما شمار بیماران جدید رو به کاهش است و این نشان دهنده کند شدن روند این بیماری است.
en-mt: Although these measures have severely damaged the economy and other parts of the country, the number of new patients is decreasing and this indicates the slowing down of the disease.

sourceString: The most optimistic estimate is that the outbreak will end by March and the downswing phase will last for 3-4 months.
targetString: خوش‌بینانه‌ترین برﺁورد این است که شیوع بیماری تا ماه مارس به پایان خواهد رسید و مرحله روند نزولی ویروس به مدت ۳ تا ۴ ماه ادامه خواهد داشت.
en-mt: The most optimistic outcome is that the outbreak will end by March and the downward trend of the virus will continue for 3-4 months.

sourceString: However, some other experts are not that optimistic.
targetString: با این وجود، برخی دیگر از کارشناسان چندان خوش‌بین نیستند.
en-mt: However, some other experts are not so optimistic.

sourceString: Paul Hunter, et al., estimated that COVID-19, which seems substantially more infectious than SARS, will not end in 2020.
targetString: Paul Hunter و همکاران تخمین زده‌اند کووید-19 که به نظر می رسد اساساً مسری‌تر از SARS باشد، در سال ۲۰۲۰ پایان نخواهد یافت.
en-mt: Paul Hunter et al estimate that Covid-19, which appears to be substantially more contagious than SARS, will not end in 2020.

sourceString: Ira Longini, et al., established a model to predict the outcome of the epidemic and suggested that SARS-CoV-2 could infect two-thirds of the global population.
targetString: Ira Longini و همکاران، مدلی برای پیش‌بینی نتیجه این اپیدمی پایه‌گذاری کردند و معتقدند که SARS-CoV-2 می‌تواند دو سوم جمعیت جهان را ﺁلوده کند.
en-mt: Ira Longini and colleagues developed a model to predict the outcome of this epidemic and believe that SARS-CoV-2 could infect two-thirds of the world's population.

sourceString: A Canadian group reported that SARS-CoV-2 was detected in both mid-turbinate and throat swabs of patients who recovered and left the hospital 2 weeks earlier, which indicates that the newly identified virus could become a cyclical episode similar to influenza.
targetString: یک گروه کانادایی گزارش دادند که SARS-CoV-2 را می‌توان در سواب شاخک میانی بینی و سواب گلوی بیمارانی که دو هفته قبل‌تر بیمارستان را ترک کرده و بهبود یافته بودند تشخیص داد، که این موضوع نشان می‌دهد ویروس تازه شناسایی شده می‌تواند به یک بیماری چرخه‌ای مشابه با ﺁنفولانزا تبدیل شود.
en-mt: A Canadian group reported that SARS-CoV-2 could be detected in nasopharyngeal swabs and throat swabs from patients who had left the hospital two weeks earlier and recovered, suggesting that the newly identified virus could cause a disease. It becomes a cycle similar to the flu.

sourceString: However, promising signs have occurred in China based on the declining number of new cases, indicating the current strategies might have been working.
targetString: با این وجود، نشانه‌های امیدوارکننده‌ای در چین بر اساس کاهش تعداد ابتلای موارد جدید وجود داشته است که نشان می‌دهد استراتژی‌های کنونی ممکن است کارساز باشند.
en-mt: However, there have been promising signs in China, based on a decline in the number of new cases, that current strategies may be working.

sourceString: Ebola was originally predicted to cause up to a million cases with half a million deaths.
targetString: در ابتدا پیش‌بینی شده بود که ابولا باعث ابتلای یک میلیون نفر و مرگ نیم میلیون نفر شود.
en-mt: At first, it was predicted that Ebola would infect one million people and kill half a million people.

sourceString: However, via strict quarantine and isolation, the disease has eventually been put under control.
targetString: با این وجود، از طریق قرنطینه و جداسازی شدید، این بیماری در نهایت تحت کنترل قرار گرفت.
en-mt: However, through strict quarantine and isolation, the disease was eventually brought under control.

sourceString: It is possible, similar to SARS-CoV, that SARS-CoV-2 might become weaker in infectivity and eventually die down or become a less pathogenic virus co-existent with humans.
targetString: این امکان وجود دارد که همانند SARS-CoV، SARS-CoV-۲ از نظر بیماری‌زایی ضعیف‌تر شود و در نهایت از بین برود و یا به یک ویروس با بیماری‌زایی کم که در کنار انسان‌ها زندگی می‌کند تبدیل شود.
en-mt: It is possible that, like SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2 will weaken in terms of pathogenicity and eventually die out or become a low-pathogenic virus that lives alongside humans.

sourceString: A comparison of the epidemic of COVID-19 with that of SARS and MERS is provided below (Fig. ​(Fig.55).
targetString: مقایسه همه‌گیری  کووید-19 با SARS و MERS در زیر نشان داده شده است ​(شکل ۵۵).
en-mt: A comparison of the Covid-19 pandemic with SARS and MERS is shown below (Figure 55).

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is highly transmittable through coughing or sneezing, and possibly also through direct contact with materials contaminated by the virus.
targetString: SARS-CoV-۲ از طریق سرفه یا عطسه بسیار قابل انتقال است و احتمالاً از طریق تماس مستقیم با مواد ﺁلوده به ویروس منتقل می‌شود.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 is highly transmissible through coughing or sneezing, and the virus is likely transmitted through direct contact with contaminated materials.

sourceString: The virus was also found in feces, which raises a new possibility of feces-to-mouth transmission.
targetString: این ویروس همچنین در مدفوع یافت شده که امکان انتقال از مدفوع به دهان را فراهم می‌کند.
en-mt: This virus has also been found in feces, which allows transmission from feces to mouth.

sourceString: A recent study on 138 cases reported that 41% of the cases were possibly caused by nosocomial infections, including 17 patients with other prior diseases and 40 health-care providers.
targetString: در یک مطالعه جدید بر روی ۱۳۸ مورد گزارش شده است که ۴۱ درصد از موارد ابتلا در اثر عفونت بیمارستانی رخ داده است که شامل ۱۷ بیمار مبتلا به بیماری‌های قبلی و ۴۰ نفر از کادر خدمات درمانی بوده است.
en-mt: In a new study on 138 cases, it has been reported that 41% of the cases were caused by hospital infection, which included 17 patients with previous diseases and 40 people from the medical service staff.

sourceString: Thus, great precaution should be used to protect humans, especially health-care providers, social workers, family members, colleagues, and even bystanders in contact with patients or infected people.
targetString: از این رو، باید در حفاظت از انسان‌ها، به‌ویژه کادر مراقبت‌های درمانی، امدادگران اجتماعی، اعضای خانواده، همکاران و حتی عابرانی که در تماس با بیماران یا افراد مبتلا به این بیماری هستند بسیار احتیاط به خرج داد.
en-mt: Therefore, it is necessary to be very careful in protecting people, especially health care staff, social workers, family members, colleagues and even passers-by who are in contact with patients or people suffering from this disease.

sourceString: The first line of defense that could be used to lower the risk of infection is through wearing face masks; both the use of surgical masks and N95 respirator masks (series # 1860s) helps control the spread of viruses.
targetString: اولین خط دفاعی که می‌تواند برای کاهش خطر ﺁلودگی استفاده شود زدن ماسک به صورت است؛ که هم می‌تواند از طریق استفاده از ماسک‌های جراحی باشد و هم ماسک‌های تنفسی N۹۵ (سری ۱۸۶۰) که به کنترل گسترش ویروس‌ها کمک می‌کند.
en-mt: The first line of defense that can be used to reduce the risk of contamination is wearing a face mask; which can be through the use of surgical masks and N95 respiratory masks (1860 series) that help control the spread of viruses.

sourceString: Surgical face masks prevent liquid droplets from a potentially infected individual from traveling through the air or sticking onto surfaces of materials, where they could be passed on to others.
targetString: ماسک جراحی مانع از عبور قطرات مایع پخش شده توسط افراد بالقوه مبتلا از طریق هوا یا چسبیدن به سطح مواد در جایی که می توانند به دیگران منتقل شوند، می‌شود.
en-mt: A surgical mask prevents droplets of liquid spread by potentially infected individuals from passing through the air or sticking to the surface of the material where they can be transmitted to others.

sourceString: However, only N95 (series # 1860s) masks can protect against the inhalation of virions as small as 10 to 80 nm, with only 5% of the virions being able to penetrate completely; SARS-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV in size and both are approximately 85 nm.
targetString: با این وجود، تنها ماسک‌های N۹۵ (سری ۱۸۶۰) می‌توانند فرد را در برابر استنشاق ذرات ویروسی به اندازه ۱۰ تا ۸۰ نانومتر محافظت کنند و تنها ۵ درصد از ذرات ویروسی می‌توانند به طور کامل از آن عبور کنند؛ SARS-CoV-2 از نظر اندازه شبیه SARS-CoV است و هر دو تقریبا ۸۵ نانومتر هستند.
en-mt: However, only N95 masks (1860 series) can protect a person from inhaling viral particles as small as 10-80 nm, and only 5% of viral particles can pass through it completely; SARS-CoV-2 is similar in size to SARS-CoV and both are approximately 85 nm.

sourceString: Since particles can penetrate even five surgical masks stacked together, health-care providers in direct contact with patients must wear N95 (series # 1860s) masks but not surgical masks.
targetString: از آنجا که ذرات می‌توانند حتی از میان پنج ماسک جراحی که روی هم قرار گرفته بگذرند، لذا کادر مراقبت‌های بهداشتی که در تماس مستقیم با بیماران هستند باید از ماسک N۹۵ (سری ۱۸۶۰)استفاده کنند، نه ماسک جراحی.
en-mt: Because particles can pass through even five surgical masks stacked on top of each other, healthcare workers who are in direct contact with patients should use N95 (1860 series) masks, not surgical masks.

sourceString: In addition to masks, health-care providers should wear fitted isolation gowns in order to further reduce contact with viruses.
targetString: علاوه بر ماسک، کادر مراقبت‌های بهداشتی باید گانهای ایزولاسیون بپوشند تا تماس با ویروس‌ها را بیشتر کاهش دهند.
en-mt: In addition to masks, healthcare workers should wear isolation gowns to further reduce exposure to viruses.

sourceString: Viruses can also infect an individual through the eyes.
targetString: ویروس‌ها می‌توانند فرد را از طریق چشم‌ها نیز آلوده کنند.
en-mt: Viruses can also infect a person through the eyes.

sourceString: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 although he wore an N95 mask; the virus might have entered his body through his inflammatory eyes.
targetString: در ۲۲ ژانویه ۲۰۲۰، یک پزشک با اینکه ماسک N95 زده بود به ویروس SARS-CoV-2 آلوده شد؛ ممکن است ویروس از طریق چشمان ملتهب او وارد بدن وی شده باشد.
en-mt: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with the SARS-CoV-2 virus even though he was wearing an N95 mask; The virus may have entered his body through his inflamed eyes.

sourceString: Thus, health-care providers should also wear transparent face shields or goggles while working with patients.
targetString: بنابراین، کادر بهداشت و درمان نیز باید در هنگام کار با بیماران، از شیلد شفاف و عینک استفاده کنند.
en-mt: Therefore, healthcare workers should also use transparent shields and glasses when working with patients.

sourceString: For the general public in affected or potentially affected areas, it is highly suggested that everybody wash their hands with disinfectant soaps more often than usual, try to stay indoors for self-quarantine and limit contact with potentially infected individuals.
targetString: برای عموم مردم در مناطق آلوده یا به طور بالقوه آلوده، بسیار پیشنهاد شده‌است که افراد دست خود را بیش از حد معمول با صابون‌های ضد عفونی‌کننده بشویند و سعی کنند در خانه بماند و ارتباط با افراد بالقوه مبتلا را محدود کنند.
en-mt: For the general public in infected or potentially infected areas, it is highly recommended that people wash their hands more than usual with antiseptic soaps and try to stay at home and limit contact with potentially infected people.

sourceString: Three feet is considered an appropriate distance for people to stay away from a patient.
targetString: فاصله سه فوت (یک متر) به عنوان فاصله مناسب برای مردم که از بیمار دور بمانند در نظر گرفته می‌شود.
en-mt: A distance of three feet (one meter) is considered a good distance for people to stay away from the patient.

sourceString: These actions are effective methods to lower the risk of infection as well as prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: این کارها، روش‌هایی موثر برای کاهش خطر عفونت و نیز جلوگیری از شیوع ویروس هستند.
en-mt: These works are effective ways to reduce the risk of infection and prevent the spread of the virus.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV-2 came as a new virus to the human world, its high homology to SARS-CoV as reported on 7 January 2020 should have caused high alert to China based on her deep memory of the SARS outbreak in 2003.
targetString: اگرچه SARS-CoV-2 به عنوان یک ویروس جدید وارد دنیای انسانی شد، اما همسانی زیاد آن با SARS - CoV که در ۷ ژانویه ۲۰۲۰ گزارش شد براساس خاطرات عمیقی که شیوع SARS در سال ۲۰۰۳ وجود داشت، هشدار مهمی برای چین داشت.
en-mt: Although SARS-CoV-2 entered the human world as a new virus, its high similarity with SARS-CoV, which was reported on January 7, 2020, based on deep memories of the 2003 SARS outbreak, was an important warning for China.

sourceString: However, not until 19 January 2020 did the director of the Center of Disease Control of Wuhan comfort the citizens by saying that the novel virus has low contagiousness and limited reproductivity from human to human and that it is not a problem to prevent and contain the disease.
targetString: با این حال، تا ۱۹ ژانویه ۲۰۲۰، مدیر مرکز کنترل بیماری ووهان، با گفتن این جمله که مسری بودن ویروس جدید کم است و انتقال آن از انسان به انسان محدود می‌باشد و اینکه مشکلی برای جلوگیری و مهار این بیماری وجود ندارد، به شهروندان دلداری می‌داد.
en-mt: However, as of January 19, 2020, the director of the Wuhan Center for Disease Control comforted the citizens by saying that the new virus is not contagious and that its transmission from human to human is limited, and that there is no problem to prevent and control the disease. was giving

sourceString: This message remarkably relaxed the alarm of the public, especially when the entire country was preparing for the Spring Festival, and the critical time was missed to contain the disease at its minimal scale in Wuhan.
targetString: این پیام به طور قابل‌توجهی آگاهی از خطر را در بین عموم مردم کاهش داد، به خصوص زمانی که کل کشور در حال آماده شدن برای فستیوال بهاره بود و زمان حیاتی برای مهار این بیماری در مقیاس حداقلی در ووهان از دست رفت.
en-mt: This message significantly reduced the awareness of the danger among the general public, especially when the whole country was preparing for the Spring Festival, and crucial time was lost to contain the disease on a minimal scale in Wuhan.

sourceString: The disease control agencies in China may take this hard lesson and make critical improvements in the future.
targetString: آژانس‌های کنترل بیماری در چین ممکن است درس سختی از این موضوع گرفته باشند و بهبودهای اساسی در آینده انجام دهند.
en-mt: Disease control agencies in China may have learned a hard lesson from this and make major improvements in the future.

sourceString: For example, these agencies should be (1) more careful when making public announcements as every word counts to citizens and can change their attitude and decisions; (2) more sensitive and reactive to unusual information from clinics rather than waiting for formal reports from doctors or officials; (3) more restrictive to contain a potential epidemic at its early stage rather than attempting to comfort the public; and (4) more often to issue targeted and effective drills to increase the public's awareness about epidemic diseases and to test and improve the response system of the society periodically.
targetString: به عنوان مثال، این سازمان‌ها باید (۱) با توجه به اینکه هر کلمه که از سوی سازمان‌های بهداشتی گفته می‌شود برای شهروندان اهمیت دارد و می‌تواند نگرش و تصمیمات مردم را تغییر دهد، باید بیشتر مراقب باشند؛ (۲) به جای اینکه منتظر گزارش‌های رسمی از سوی پزشکان و مقامات باشد، نسبت به اطلاعات غیر معمول که از کلینیک‌ها دریافت می‌شود بسیار حساس‌تر بوده و به آنها واکنش نشان دهند؛ (3) به جای تلاش برای دلداری دادن مردم، اقدامات محدود کننده بیشتری را برای مهار یک اپیدمی بالقوه در مراحل اولیه آن انجام دهند و (۴)به منظور افزایش آگاهی عمومی در مورد بیماری‌های همه‌گیر و آزمایش و بهبود سیستم پاسخ جامعه به صورت دوره‌ای، صدور دستورالعملهای هدفمند و موثر را مکرر انجام دهند.
en-mt: For example, these organizations should (1) be more careful considering that every word spoken by health organizations is important to citizens and can change people's attitudes and decisions; (2) be more sensitive to and react to unusual information received from clinics rather than waiting for official reports from doctors and authorities; (3) take more restrictive measures to contain a potential epidemic in its early stages rather than trying to comfort the public, and (4) to increase public awareness of epidemics and periodically test and improve the community response system. , issue targeted and effective instructions frequently.

sourceString: The outbreak of COVID-19 caused by the novel virus SARS-CoV-2 started in the end of December 2019.
targetString: شیوع بیماری کووید-19 توسط ویروس جدید SARS-CoV-2 در اواخر دسامبر سال ۲۰۱۹ آغاز شد.
en-mt: The outbreak of Covid-19 by the new SARS-CoV-2 virus started in late December 2019.

sourceString: In less than two months, it has spread all over China and near 50 other countries globally at the time of this writing.
targetString: در کم‌تر از دو ماه و زمان نگارش این مطلب، این ویروس در سراسر چین و نزدیک به ۵۰ کشور دیگر در سطح جهان گسترش ‌یافته است.
en-mt: In less than two months and at the time of writing this article, this virus has spread throughout China and nearly 50 other countries worldwide.

sourceString: Since the virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and the symptoms are also similar between COVID-19 and SARS, the outbreak of COVID-19 has created a sense of SARS recurring.
targetString: از آنجا که این ویروس بسیار شبیه به SARS-CoV است و علائم مشابهی بین کووید-19 و SARS وجود دارد، لذا شیوع کووید-19 حس بازگشت SARS را ایجاد کرده‌است.
en-mt: Since this virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and there are similar symptoms between covid-19 and SARS, the outbreak of covid-19 has created a sense of the return of SARS.

sourceString: However, there are some remarkable differences between COVID-19 and SARS, which are essential for containing the epidemic and treating the patients.
targetString: با این حال، تفاوت‌های قابل‌توجهی بین کووید-19 و SARS وجود دارد که دانستن آنها برای مهار این اپیدمی و درمان بیماران ضروری است.
en-mt: However, there are significant differences between Covid-19 and SARS that are essential to know in order to contain this epidemic and treat patients.

sourceString: COVID-19 affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women, and the severity and death rate are also higher in elderly individual than in youth.
targetString: کووید-19 بر افراد مسن بیشتر از جوانان و بر مردان بیشتر از زنان تاثیر می‌گذارد و شدت و میزان مرگ و میر آن نیز در افراد مسن بیشتر از جوانان است.
en-mt: Covid-19 affects older people more than young people and men more than women, and its severity and death rate are higher in older people than in young people.

sourceString: SARS has higher mortality than COVID-19 (10.91% versus 1.44%).
targetString: کشندگی SARS نسبت به کووید-19 بیشتر بود (۱۰.۹۱% در برابر ۱.۴۴%).
en-mt: The lethality of SARS was higher than that of Covid-19 (10.91% vs. 1.44%).

sourceString: COVID-19 patients transmit the virus even when they are symptomless whereas SARS patients do so usually when they are severely ill, which causes much greater difficulty to contain the spread of COVID-19 than SARS.
targetString: بیماران مبتلا به کووید-19 حتی هنگامی که علائمی ندارند ویروس را منتقل می‌کنند در حالی که بیماران مبتلا به بیماری SARS وقتی به شدت بیمار می‌شدند ویروس را منتقل می‌کردند، که باعث شد مهار کووید-19 نسبت به SARS سختتر ‌شود.
en-mt: Patients with covid-19 transmit the virus even when they have no symptoms, while patients with SARS transmit the virus when they become severely ill, making covid-19 more difficult to contain than SARS.

sourceString: This partially explains why SARS-CoV-2 spread much faster and broader than SARS-CoV.
targetString: این موضوع تا حدی توضیح می‌دهد که چرا SARS-CoV-2 بیشتر و وسیع‌تر از SARS-CoV گسترش یافت.
en-mt: This partly explains why SARS-CoV-2 spread more and more widely than SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The regular RNA assay for SARS-CoV-2 can be negative in some COVID-19 patients.
targetString: آزمایش عادی RNA در SARS-CoV-2 ممکن است در برخی از بیماران کووید-19 منفی باشد.
en-mt: Routine RNA testing for SARS-CoV-2 may be negative in some covid-19 patients.

sourceString: On the other hand, cured patients can be positive for the virus again.
targetString: از طرف دیگر، بیماران درمان شده می‌توانند دوباره به ویروس مبتلا شده و نتیجه آزمایش آنها مثبت باشد.
en-mt: On the other hand, treated patients can re-infect with the virus and test positive.

sourceString: These findings dramatically increase the risk of virus spreading.
targetString: این یافته‌ها به طور چشمگیری خطر گسترش ویروس را افزایش می‌دهند.
en-mt: These findings dramatically increase the risk of the virus spreading.

sourceString: Given such rapid progress in research on COVID-19, several critical issues remain to be solved, as follows:
targetString: با توجه به چنین پیشرفت سریعی در تحقیقات مربوط به کووید-19، چندین مساله مهم همچنان حل نشده باق مانده‌اند که به شرح زیر است:
en-mt: Due to such rapid progress in the research related to Covid-19, several important questions remain unsolved, as follows:

sourceString: Where did SARS-CoV-2 come from?
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 از کجا آمد؟
en-mt: Where did SARS-CoV-2 come from?

sourceString: Although 96% genetic homolog was found between SARS-CoV-2 and two bat SARS-like CoVs, we still cannot conclude that SARS-CoV-2 is from bats.
targetString: اگرچه بین SARS-CoV-2 و دو CoV سارس‌مانند خفاشی حدود ۹۶ % همسانی ژنتیکی دیده می‌شود، اما هنوز نمی‌توانیم نتیجه بگیریم که SARS-CoV-2 از خفاش‌ها است.
en-mt: Although there is about 96% genetic similarity between SARS-CoV-2 and two bat SARS-like CoVs, we still cannot conclude that SARS-CoV-2 is from bats.

sourceString: What animal was the intermediate species to transmit the virus from the original host, say bats, to humans?
targetString: کدام حیوان به عنوان واسط، ویروس را از میزبان اصلی مثلا خفاش‌ها، به انسان‌ها انتقال داد؟
en-mt: Which animal, as an intermediary, transmitted the virus from the main host, such as bats, to humans?

sourceString: Without knowing answers to #1 and 2, we cannot efficiently cut the transmission, and the outbreak can relapse at any time.
targetString: بدون دانستن پاسخ سوالات ۱ و ۲، نمی‌توانیم انتقال را به طور موثر قطع کنیم و شیوع بیماری در هر زمانی ممکن است عود کند.
en-mt: Without knowing the answers to questions 1 and 2, we cannot effectively stop transmission and the outbreak may recur at any time.

sourceString: Although molecular modeling and biochemical assays have demonstrated that SARS-CoV-2 binds to ACE2, how exactly does the virus enter the airway cells and cause subsequent pathological changes?
targetString: اگرچه مدل‌سازی مولکولی و سنجش‌های بیوشیمیایی مشخص کرده‌اند که SARS-CoV-2 به ACE۲ متصل می‌شود، اما ویروس چگونه وارد سلول‌های راه تنفسی شده و موجب تغییرات بعدی وابسته به بیماری می‌شود؟
en-mt: Although molecular modeling and biochemical assays have established that SARS-CoV-2 binds to ACE2, how does the virus enter airway cells and induce subsequent disease-related changes?

sourceString: Does the virus also bind ACE2-expressing cells in other organs?
targetString: آیا این ویروس به سلول‌های دارای ACE۲ در اندام‌های دیگر هم متصل می‌شود؟
en-mt: Does this virus attach to cells with ACE2 in other organs?

sourceString: Without clear answers to these questions, we cannot achieve fast and accurate diagnosis and effective treatment.
targetString: بدون پاسخ صریح به این سوالات، نمی‌توانیم به تشخیص سریع و دقیق و درمان موثر دست یابیم.
en-mt: Without clear answers to these questions, we cannot achieve a quick and accurate diagnosis and effective treatment.

sourceString: How long will the epidemic last?
targetString: تا چه زمانی شیوع ادامه دارد؟
en-mt: How long does the outbreak last?

sourceString: How is the virus genetically evolving during transmission among humans?
targetString: ویروس در طی انتقال بین انسان‌ها، چگونه به طور ژنتیکی متحول می‌شود؟
en-mt: How does the virus mutate genetically during human-to-human transmission?

sourceString: Will it become a pandemic worldwide, die down like SARS or relapse periodically like the flu?
targetString: آیا این بیماری در سراسر جهان تبدیل به یک بیماری همه‌گیر خواهد شد، مانند سارس کم‌ کم از بین می‌رود یا به صورت دوره‌ای مانند آنفلوآنزا باز می‌گردد؟
en-mt: Will it become a worldwide pandemic, die out like SARS, or come back periodically like the flu?

sourceString: It is essential but may take some time to search for answers to the above and many other questions.
targetString: پاسخ سوالات بالا ضروری است اما ممکن است مدتی طول بکشد تا به جواب سوالات فوق و بسیاری سوالات دیگر برسیم.
en-mt: The answers to the above questions are necessary, but it may take some time to get the answers to the above and many other questions.

sourceString: However, with whatever expense it may demand, we have no other choice but to stop the epidemic as soon as possible and bring our life back to normal.
targetString: با این حال، با هر هزینه‌ای که ممکن است لازم باشد، چاره‌ای نداریم جز اینکه هرچه زودتر این همه‌گیری را متوقف کنیم و زندگی خود را به حالت عادی برگردانیم.
en-mt: However, at whatever cost it may take, we have no choice but to stop this epidemic and get our lives back to normal as soon as possible.

sourceString: Zoonotic origins of human coronaviruses
targetString: منشاء حیوانی ویروس کرونای انسانی
en-mt: Animal origin of human corona virus

sourceString: Mutation and adaptation have driven the co-evolution of coronaviruses (CoVs) and their hosts, including human beings, for thousands of years.
targetString: هزاران سال است که سازگاری و انطباق، باعث تکامل همزمان ویروس کرونا (CoVها) و میزبان آنها از جمله انسان‌ها شده است.
en-mt: For thousands of years, adaptation has caused the co-evolution of coronaviruses (CoVs) and their hosts, including humans.

sourceString: Before 2003, two human CoVs (HCoVs) were known to cause mild illness, such as common cold.
targetString: قبل از سال ۲۰۰۳، دو CoV انسانی (HCoV) شناخته شده بودند که علت بیماری خفیف مانند سرماخوردگی بودند.
en-mt: Before 2003, two human CoVs (HCoVs) were known to cause mild illness such as the common cold.

sourceString: The outbreaks of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) and the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) have flipped the coin to reveal how devastating and life-threatening an HCoV infection could be.
targetString: ظهور سندرم حاد تنفسی (SARS) و سندرم تنفسی خاورمیانه (MERS)، آن روی سکه را نشان داد که عفونت HCoV تا چه حد می‌تواند ویرانگر و خطرناک باشد.
