targetString: در ارتباط بودن در مورد مسائل مربوط به کووید-19
en-mt: Staying connected on issues related to Covid-19

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: ما برای پنج شنبه آینده، ساعت 14:00 به وقت UTC با 07:00 به وقت PT، دعوتنامه جلسه ای را برای کارمندان ویژه به تقویم های شما ارسال می کنیم.
en-mt: We're posting a special staff meeting invitation to your calendars for next Thursday at 2:00 PM UTC at 7:00 AM PT.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: ما از این وقت استفاده کرده و اطلاعات جدید و بیشتری را در اختیار شما قرار می دهیم، به سؤالات شما پاسخ می دهیم  و مدتی را صرف ارتباط با یکدیگر خواهیم کرد.
en-mt: We will use this time to provide you with new and additional information, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: همه ما در این مورد در کنار هم هستیم و ما اینجاییم تا از هر طریق ممکن به شما کمک کنیم.
en-mt: We are all in this together and we are here to help you in any way we can.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: در ضمن، شما می توانید اطلاعات مربوط را از طریق این ایمیل و سایر اطلاعات مرتبط با کووید-19 را در Office Wiki پیدا کنید.
en-mt: In the meantime, you can find information related to this email and other information related to Covid-19 on the Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT این صفحات را به روز کرده و کلیه اطلاعات را در یک مکان نگه می دارد.
en-mt: CRT updates these pages and keeps all information in one place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: ما همچنین در تلاشیم تا ارتباط منظم با آن دسته از کارمندان خود برقرار کنیم که ساکن کشورهایی هستند که در حال حاضر به طور قابل توجهی تحت تأثیر قرار گرفته اند.
en-mt: We are also attempting to maintain regular contact with those of our employees who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: اگر در مورد مسافرت، رویدادها، جریان اصلی کار یا چالش پوشش های خبری، یا هر چیز دیگری که ممکن است در مورد آن به کمک نیاز داشته باشید، سؤالی دارید، لطفاً در اطلاع دادن و همکاری با CRT دریغ نکنید.
en-mt: If you have any questions about travel, events, mainstream work or coverage challenges, or anything else you might need help with, please don't hesitate to let CRT know and work with you.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: ما اینجا هستیم تا در صورت لزوم کمک کرده و از شما پشتیبانی کنیم.
en-mt: We are here to help and support you as needed.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: اگر میخواهید در مورد یک موضوع محرمانه یا حساس صحبت کنید، لطفاً به Bryan Judan - مدیر عملیات بین المللی منابع انسانی ایمیل بزنید.
en-mt: If you would like to discuss a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of International Human Resources Operations.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: هیچکدام از این تغییرات نباید به عنوان رها کردن کار و تعهدات ما تلقی شود.
en-mt: None of these changes should be construed as an abandonment of our work and obligations.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: بلکه نشان دهنده این است که در این لحظه کار و تعهدات ما احتمالاً نیاز به انطباق با روشی دارد که در گذشته نداشته ایم.
en-mt: Rather, it indicates that at this moment our work and commitments may need to adapt in a way that we have not in the past.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: اینها مراحلی اند که ما معتقدیم برای حمایت از همدیگر ضروری است تا بتوانیم به کار خود ادامه داده و از حرکت خود پشتیبانی کنیم و خدماتی را که جهانیان به آنها اتکا دارند، ارائه دهیم.
en-mt: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support each other so we can continue to work and support our movement and provide the services the world relies on.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: کارهایی را که برنامه ریزی کرد ایم زمانش که فرا برسد، در انتظار ما خواهد بود.
en-mt: The things we have planned will be waiting for us when the time comes.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: فعلا وقت آن است که از یکدیگر حمایت کنیم و فضا را برای کارهای مهمی که قرار است در هفته ها و احتمالاً ماه های  پیش رو انجام شوند، ایجاد کنیم.
en-mt: Now is the time to support each other and create space for the important work to be done in the weeks and possibly months ahead.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: ما به همه شما برای تحقق این امر احتیاج داریم، بنابراین از شما می خواهیم که مراقبت خود و خانواده های خود باشید تا بتوانید زمانی که نیاز افزایش پیدا می کند، در بهترین حالت خود باشید.
en-mt: We need all of you to make this happen, so we ask that you take care of yourselves and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: حالا، لطفاً دستهایتان را بشویید و به صورت خود دست نزنید!
en-mt: Now, please wash your hands and don't touch your face!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Katherine، CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S) و بقیه تیم رهبری (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
en-mt: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S) and the rest of the leadership team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: b'آنزیم مبدل آنژیوتانسین 2 (ACE2) آنزیمی است که به سطح خارجی (غشای سلولی) سلول‌های ریه، سرخرگ‌ها، قلب، کلیه و روده می‌چسبد.
en-mt: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme that attaches to the outer surface (cell membrane) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestine.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2 فعالیت آنزیم مرتبط مبدل آنژیوتانسین (ACE) را با کاهش مقدار آنژیوتانسین-II و افزایش (Ang(1-7 مختل می‌کند که همین قابلیت آن را به هدف دارویی امیدبخشی برای درمان بیماری قلبی-عروقی تبدیل کرده است. ACE2 همچنین به عنوان نقطه ورود به سلول برای برخی کروناویروس‌ها عمل می‌کند.
en-mt: ACE2 inhibits the activity of angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by decreasing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing (Ang(1-7), which has made it a promising drug target for the treatment of cardiovascular disease. ACE2 also acts as a point Cell entry works for some coronaviruses.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: نسخه انسانی این آنزیم را اغلب hACE2 می‌نامند.
en-mt: The human version of this enzyme is often called hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: آنزیم مبدل آنژیوتانسین 2 نوعی متالوآنزیم حاوی روی است که روی سطح سلول‌های اندوتلیال و دیگر سلول‌ها قرار دارد.
en-mt: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc-containing metalloenzyme that is located on the surface of endothelial cells and other cells.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: پروتئین ACE2 حاوی یک دامنه N-ترمینال پپتیداز M2 و یک دامنه حامل آمینو اسید کلیوی C-ترمینال کولکترین است.
en-mt: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal M2 peptidase domain and a C-terminal colectin renal amino acid carrier domain.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 یک پروتئین غشایی تک-عبوری نوع I است که دامنه فعال آنزیمی آن در مجاورت سطح سلول‌های ریه و بافتهای دیگر قرار می‌گیرد.
en-mt: ACE2 is a type I single-pass membrane protein whose active enzyme domain is located near the surface of lung cells and other tissues.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: دامنه خارج سلولی ACE2 به همراه آنزیم دیگری به نام شداز از دامنه تراغشایی جدا می‌شود و پروتئین محلول حاصل پس از ورود به جریان خون سرانجام با ادرار دفع می‌شود.
en-mt: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is separated from the transpiration domain together with another enzyme called Shadase, and the resulting soluble protein is finally excreted with urine after entering the bloodstream.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2 در بیشتر اندام‌ها وجود دارد: ACE2 به غشای سلولی سلول‌های حبابی نوع II عمدتاً ریوی، انتروسیت‌های روده کوچک، سلول‌های اندوتلیال سرخرگی و سیاهرگی و سلول‌های عضله صاف بیشتر اندام‌ها می‌چسبد.
en-mt: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 binds to the cell membrane of type II alveolar cells, mainly pulmonary, enterocytes of the small intestine, endothelial cells of arterioles and veins, and smooth muscle cells of most organs.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: نشانه‌های ACE2 mRNA در کورتکس مغز، جسم مخطط، هیپوتالاموس و ساقه مغز دیده می‌شود.
en-mt: ACE2 mRNA signals are seen in cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus and brainstem.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: کارکرد اصلی ACE2 فعالیت به عنوان خنثی‌کننده ACE است.
en-mt: The main function of ACE2 is to act as an ACE inhibitor.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE هورمون آنژیوتانسین I را به آنژیوتانسین تنگ‌کننده رگ II تبدیل می‌کند.
en-mt: ACE converts the hormone angiotensin I to the vasoconstrictor angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2 به نوبه خود فنیل‌آلانین آمینو اسید کربوکسیل-ترمینال را از آنژیوتانسینII (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) جدا می‌کند و به آنژیوتانسین رگ‌گشا (1-7)، (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH) هیدرولیز می‌کند.
en-mt: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) to the vasodilatory angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val -Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH) hydrolyzes.

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 می‌تواند تعدادی از پپتیدهای دیگر مانند [des-Arg9]-برادی‌کین، آپلین، نوروتنسین، دینورفین A و گرلین را بشکند.
en-mt: ACE2 can cleave a number of other peptides such as [des-Arg9]-bradykin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A and ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 همچنین جریان غشایی حامل آمینو اسید خنثی SLC6A19 را تنظیم می‌کند و در ایجاد بیماری هارت ناپ نقش دارد.
en-mt: ACE2 also regulates membrane efflux of the neutral amino acid carrier SLC6A19 and plays a role in the development of Hartknapp disease.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: ACE2، به عنوان پروتئین تراغشایی، نقش نقطه اصلی ورود به سلول را برای برخی کروناویروس‌ها مانند HCoV-NL63؛ SARS-CoV (ویروس عامل سارس)؛ و SARS-CoV-2 (ویروس عامل کووید-19) بازی می‌کند.
en-mt: ACE2, as a cleavage protein, plays the role of the main point of entry into the cell for some coronaviruses such as HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (virus that causes SARS); And SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes Covid-19) plays.

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: مهم‌تر این که، چسبیدن پروتئین اسپایک S1 ویروس‌های SARS-CoV و SARS-CoV2 به دامنه آنزیماتیک ACE2 در سطح سلول‌ها منجر به درون‌یاختگی و جابجایی ویروس و آنزیم در اندوزوم‌های درون سلول‌ها می‌شود.
en-mt: More importantly, the attachment of the S1 spike protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 viruses to the ACE2 enzymatic domain on the surface of cells leads to the internalization and movement of the virus and enzyme in the endosomes inside the cells.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: این فرآیند ورود مستلزم آماده‌سازی پروتئین S به وسیله TMPRSS2 پروتئاز سرین میزبان است که بازدارندگی آن در روند تحقیقات جاری به عنوان درمان احتمالی در دست بررسی است. این فرضیه مطرح شده است که کاهش میزان ACE2 در سلول‌ها ممکن است به مقابله با عفونت کمک کند.
en-mt: This entry process requires preparation of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is being investigated as a possible treatment in ongoing research. It has been hypothesized that reducing the amount of ACE2 in cells may help fight infection.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: هرچند، جوامع حرفه‌ای و نهادهای نظارتی متعددی پیشنهاد کرده‌اند که درمان با بازدارنده ACE استاندارد و ARB ادامه یابد.
en-mt: However, several professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: بازبینی قاعده‌مند و فراتحلیل منتشرشده در 11 جولای 2012 مشخص کرد که «استفاده از بازدارنده‌های ACE با کاهش چشمگیر 34 درصدی احتمال ذات الریه در مقایسه با کنترل‌ها، ارتباط دارد.»
en-mt: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012 found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in the risk of pneumonia compared with controls."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: در ضمن، «احتمال ذات الریه در بیماران درمان‌شده با بازدارنده‌های ACE که احتمال ابتلا به ذات الریه در آنها بالاتر بود، به‌ویژه آنهایی که دچار سکته و نارسایی قلبی شده بودند، کاهش یافت.
en-mt: Meanwhile, "the risk of pneumonia was reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were more likely to develop pneumonia, especially those who had had a stroke or heart failure."

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: استفاده از بازدارنده‌های ACE با کاهش تلفات ناشی از ذات الریه ارتباط داشت، هرچند نتایج در مقایسه با نتایج کلی احتمال ابتلا به ذات الریه ضعیف‌تر بود.»
en-mt: "The use of ACE inhibitors was associated with reduced mortality from pneumonia, although the results were weaker compared to the overall risk of pneumonia."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: گمان بر این است که ACE انسانی بازپیوسته (rhACE2) درمان جدیدی برای آسیب حاد ریوی محسوب می‌شود و ظاهراً همودینامیک تنفسی و اشباع اکسیژن را در خوکچه‌های دچار سندروم دیسترس تنفسی حاد ناشی از لیپوپلی‌ساکارید بهبود بخشیده است.
en-mt: Recombinant human ACE (rhACE2) is suspected to be a novel treatment for acute lung injury and appears to improve respiratory hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: نیمه عمر rhACE2 در انسان حدود 10 ساعت است و شروع عمل 30 دقیقه به علاوه دوره تاثیر (مدت) 24 ساعته است.
en-mt: The half-life of rhACE2 in humans is about 10 hours, with an onset of action of 30 minutes plus a 24-hour duration of action.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: برخی یافته‌ها حاکی از آن است که rhACE2 ممکن است دارویی نویدبخش برای افراد دچار حساسیت به بازدارنده‌های سیستمی و کلاسیک رنین-آنژیوتانسین (بازدارنده‌های RSA) یا بیماری‌های عامل تقویت گردش آنژیوتانسین II باشد. تاثیر تزریق rhACE2 در کارآزمایی‌های بالینی برای درمان سندروم دیسترس تنفسی حاد ارزیابی شده است.
en-mt: Some findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for people with sensitivity to systemic and classic renin-angiotensin inhibitors (RSA inhibitors) or angiotensin II receptor blockers. The effect of rhACE2 injection has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: b'برنامه‌های کووید-19 برنامه‌های نرم‌افزاری تلفن همراهی هستند که برای رهگیری تماس در دوران پاندمی کروناویروس 20-2019، یعنی فرآیند شناسایی افرادی (ارتباطاتی) که احتمالاً با فرد آلوده در تماس بوده‌اند، به کار می‌روند.
en-mt: b'Covid-19 applications are mobile phone software applications used for contact tracing during the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, the process of identifying people (contacts) who may have been in contact with an infected person.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: برنامه‌های متعددی توسعه یافته یا پیشنهاد شده‌اند که در برخی سرزمین‌ها و مناطق از حمایت مسئولان دولتی برخوردارند.
en-mt: Several programs have been developed or proposed that are supported by government officials in some territories and regions.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: چارچوب‌های متعددی برای تهیه برنامه‌های رهگیری تماس توسعه یافته است.
en-mt: Several frameworks have been developed for developing call tracking applications.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: مشکلاتی درباره حریم خصوصی، به‌ویژه در سامانه‌های مبتنی بر رهگیری مکان جغرافیایی کاربران برنامه، مطرح شده است.
en-mt: Problems about privacy have been raised, especially in systems based on tracking the geographic location of app users.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: از راهکارهای کمتر مداخله‌آمیز می‌توان به استفاده از سیگنال‌های بلوتوث برای ثبت نزدیکی کاربر به تلفن های همراه دیگر اشاره کرد.
en-mt: One of the less intrusive solutions is the use of Bluetooth signals to record the user's proximity to other mobile phones.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: در 10 آوریل 2020، گوگل و اپل مشترکاً اعلام کردند که قابلیت حمایت از برنامه‌های بلوتوث-محور را مستقیماً در سیستم‌های عامل اندروید و iOS خواهند گنجاند.
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they will include support for Bluetooth-centric apps directly into the Android and iOS operating systems.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: در چین، دولت چین، با همکاری Alipay، برنامه‌ای را توسعه داده است که شهروندان به کمک آن می‌توانند بفهمند که آیا با افراد دچار کووید-19 تماس داشته‌اند یا خیر.
en-mt: In China, the Chinese government, in collaboration with Alipay, has developed an app that allows citizens to find out if they have been in contact with someone with Covid-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: این برنامه در بیش از 200 شهر چین به کار گرفته شده است. در سنگاپور، از برنامه‌ای به نام TraceTogether استفاده می‌شود.
en-mt: This program has been used in more than 200 cities in China. In Singapore, a program called TraceTogether is used.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: این برنامه به وسیله جامعه IT محلی توسعه یافته است، به صورت منبع باز منتشر شده است و به دولت واگذار خواهد شد. مقدونیه شمالی برنامه بلوتوث-محوری به نام "StopKorona!" را برای رهگیری تماس احتمالی با افراد آلوده و ارائه پاسخ فوری به مراجع درمانی منتشر کرده است.
en-mt: The program is developed by the local IT community, released as open source, and will be handed over to the government. North Macedonia's Bluetooth-centric program called "StopKorona!" has published to detect possible contact with infected people and provide immediate response to medical authorities.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: این برنامه را وزارت ارتباطات و فناوری و وزارت بهداشت توسعه داده‌اند.
en-mt: This program was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and the Ministry of Health.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: تا 14 آوریل 2020، این برنامه منتظر تایید Play Store گوگل و App Store اپل بوده است.
en-mt: As of April 14, 2020, the app is awaiting Google Play Store and Apple App Store approval.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: در 12 آوریل، دولت اعلام کرد که برنامه رهگیری تماس در مرحله پیشرفته توسعه است و ظرف چند هفته آماده استقرار خواهد شد. برنامه مشابهی ("StopCovid") در ایرلند و فرانسه اجرا می‌شود.
en-mt: On April 12, the government announced that the contact tracing program was in an advanced stage of development and would be ready for deployment within weeks. A similar program ("StopCovid") is being implemented in Ireland and France.

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: هم استرالیا و هم زلاندنو برنامه‌هایی را بر اساس برنامه TraceTogether و پروتکل BlueTrace مد نظر دارند. روسیه قصد دارد یک برنامه تعیین محدوده جغرافیایی برای بیماران مبتلا به کووید-19 و ساکن مسکو، برای جلوگیری از خروج این افراد از منزل، معرفی کند.
en-mt: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering programs based on the TraceTogether program and the BlueTrace protocol. Russia is planning to introduce a geographic restriction program for patients with Covid-19 and living in Moscow, to prevent these people from leaving their homes.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: راس اندرسون، استاد مهندسی امنیت در دانشگاه کمبریج، به تعدادی از مشکلات کاربردی مربوط به سامانه‌های برنامه-محور، شامل نتایج مثبت کاذب و ناکارآمدی احتمالی در صورت استفاده از برنامه در نمونه‌های جمعیتی کوچک، اشاره کرده است.
en-mt: Ross Anderson, a professor of security engineering at the University of Cambridge, has pointed out a number of practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and possible ineffectiveness if the app is used in small population samples.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: اپل با بررسی مشکلات مربوط به گسترش برنامه‌های گمراه‌کننده یا زیان‌آور «کروناویروس»، محدودیت‌هایی درباره نوع سازمان‌هایی که مجاز به افزودن برنامه‌های کروناویروس به App Store هستند اعمال کرده است و فقط به سازمان‌های «رسمی» یا معتبر اجازه چنین کاری را می‌دهد.
en-mt: Investigating concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple has placed restrictions on the type of organizations allowed to add coronavirus apps to the App Store, allowing only "official" or trusted organizations to do so.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: گوگل و آمازون نیز محدودیت‌های مشابهی اعمال کرده‌اند.
en-mt: Google and Amazon have also imposed similar restrictions.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: مدافعان حریم خصوصی از پیامدهای نظارت همگانی با استفاده از برنامه‌های کروناویروس ابراز نگرانی کرده‌اند و به‌ویژه اعلام کرده‌اند که مشخص نیست آیا زیرساخت نظارتی ایجادشده برای پاندمی کروناویروس پس از برطرف شدن این تهدید برچیده خواهد شد یا خیر.
en-mt: Privacy advocates have expressed concern about the implications of public surveillance using coronavirus apps, and in particular, have stated that it is unclear whether the surveillance infrastructure built for the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat is over.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: عفو بین‌الملل و بیش از 100 سازمان دیگر با صدور بیانیه‌ای خواستار محدود شدن این نوع از نظارت شده‌اند.
en-mt: Amnesty International and more than 100 other organizations have issued a statement calling for this type of surveillance to be limited.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: این سازمان‌ها هشت شرط را برای طرحهای دولتی برشمرده‌اند:
en-mt: These organizations have listed eight conditions for government plans:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: نظارت باید «قانونی، ضروری و متناسب باشد»؛
en-mt: Supervision must be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: الحاقیه‌های پایش و نظارت باید دارای بندهایی با امکان لغو خودکار باشد؛
en-mt: Monitoring add-ons must have automatic cancellation clauses;

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: کاربرد داده‌ها باید به موارد مربوط به کووید-19 محدود شود؛
en-mt: The use of the data should be limited to cases related to Covid-19;

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: امنیت داده‌ها و ناشناسی باید تضمین شود و بر اساس شواهد محافظت گردد؛
en-mt: Data security and anonymity must be guaranteed and protected based on evidence;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: نظارت دیجیتال نباید زمینه‌ساز تشدید تبعیض و انزوا شود؛
en-mt: Digital surveillance should not become the basis for intensifying discrimination and isolation;

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: انتقال داده‌ها به اشخاص ثالث باید در چارچوب قانون باشد؛
en-mt: The transfer of data to third parties must be within the framework of the law;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: ضمانت‌هایی باید برای پیشگیری از سوء‌استفاده و حق شهروندان برای شکایت از سوء‌استفاده در نظر گرفته شود؛
en-mt: Safeguards should be in place to prevent abuse and the right of citizens to complain about abuse;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: مشارکت هدفمند همه «ذینفعان مرتبط» از جمله کارشناسان بهداشت عمومی و گروه‌های در حاشیه، ضروری است. باشگاه Chaos Computer (CCC) آلمان و گزارشگران بدون مرز (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) نیز فهرست‌هایی را منتشر کرده‌اند.
en-mt: Targeted involvement of all “relevant stakeholders” including public health experts and marginalized groups is essential. Germany's Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (RSF) also publish lists.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: برنامه پیشنهادی گوگل/اپل با هدف رسیدگی به مشکل نظارت مستمر از طریق حذف سازوکار رهگیری از سیستم‌های عامل دستگاه آنها، پس از رفع ضرورت، ارائه شده است.
en-mt: The proposed program by Google/Apple aims to address the problem of continuous monitoring by removing the tracking mechanism from their device operating systems, once the necessity is removed.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: در برخی کشورها به جای برنامه از فرآیند مکان‌یابی شبکه-محور استفاده شده است و در نتیجه ضرورت دانلود برنامه و توانایی فرار از رهگیری از بین رفته است.
en-mt: In some countries, a network-based location process has been used instead of an app, and as a result, the need to download the app and the ability to evade tracking have been lost.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: در اسرائیل، رهگیری شبکه-محور تصویب شده است.
en-mt: In Israel, network-centric surveillance has been approved.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: راهکارهای شبکه-محور که به داده‌های خام مکانی دسترسی دارند، ممکن است حریم خصوصی را نقض کنند.
en-mt: Network-centric solutions that access raw spatial data may violate privacy.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: هرچند، چنین نیست که همه سامانه‌های دارای سرور مرکزی نیازمند دسترسی به داده‌های مکانی شخصی باشند؛ تعدادی از سامانه‌های حافظ حریم خصوصی از سرورهای مرکزی فقط برای ارتباطات داخلی استفاده می‌کنند (قسمت زیر را ببینید).
en-mt: However, not all systems with a central server require access to personal location data; A number of privacy-preserving systems use central servers for internal communications only (see below).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: در کره جنوبی، از یک سامانه غیر برنامه‌ای برای رهگیری تماس استفاده شد.
en-mt: In South Korea, a non-programmed call interception system was used.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: این سامانه، به جای استفاده از برنامه تخصصی، اطلاعات رهگیری را از منابع مختلف شامل داده‌های رهگیری دستگاه همراه و داده‌های تراکنش‌های کارتی، جمع‌آوری می‌کرد و برای اطلاع‌رسانی پیامکی به افراد احتمالاً آلوده به کار می‌گرفت.
en-mt: Instead of using a specialized program, this system collected tracking information from various sources, including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and used it to send SMS notifications to potentially infected people.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: دولت علاوه بر استفاده از این اطلاعات برای پیام‌رسانی به مخاطبان احتمالی، اطلاعات مکانی را در دسترس عموم قرار دارد. این نوع افشای اطلاعات بر اثر تغییرات گسترده قوانین محافظت از اطلاعات، بر اثر شیوع MERS در این کشور، مجاز شده است.
en-mt: In addition to using this information to send messages to potential audiences, the government also makes location information available to the public. This type of disclosure is permitted by sweeping changes to data protection laws in response to the MERS outbreak in this country.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: این اطلاعات از طریق تعدادی برنامه و وب‌سایت در دسترس عموم قرار دارد. برخی کشورها مانند آلمان استفاده از سامانه‌های متمرکز و حافظ حریم خصوصی را مد نظر قرار داده‌اند.
en-mt: This information is available to the public through a number of programs and websites. Some countries, such as Germany, have considered the use of centralized and privacy-protecting systems.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: تا 6 آوریل 2020، این جزییات هنوز افشا نشده است.
en-mt: As of April 6, 2020, these details have not yet been revealed.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: رهگیری تماس با حفظ حریم خصوصی مفهوم پذیرفته‌شده‌ای است که سابقه پژوهش‌های مستند مربوط به آن به حداقل 2013 بازمی‌گردد.تا 7 آوریل 2020، ده‌ها گروه کارشناسی مشغول کار بر روی راهکارهای حافظ حریم خصوصی، مانند استفاده از «انرژی پایین بلوتوث» (BLE)، برای ثبت میزان نزدیکی کاربر به دیگر تلفن‌های همراه بودند.
en-mt: Privacy-preserving call tracking is an accepted concept with documented research history dating back to at least 2013. As of April 7, 2020, dozens of research groups are working on privacy-preserving solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), They were used to record the user's proximity to other mobile phones.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: با این حال، PEPP-PT تلاشی هماهنگ است که رویکردهای متمرکز و غیرمتمرکز را در بر می‌گیرد و پروتکل مستقلی نیست. از پروتکل‌های غیرمتمرکز، می‌توان به «رهگیری نزدیک غیرمتمرکز با حفظ حریم خصوصی» (DP-PPT/DP-3T)، «شماره‌های تماس موقت» (TCN، معروف به شماره‌های رویداد تماس، CEN)، «پروتکل‌های حساس به حریم خصوصی» و «سازوکارهای رهگیری تماس سیار» (PACT) اشاره کرد.
en-mt: However, PEPP-PT is a coordinated effort that incorporates centralized and decentralized approaches and is not a stand-alone protocol. Decentralized protocols include Decentralized Proximity Tracking with Privacy (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Call Numbers (TCN, also known as Call Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols, and "Mechanisms for Mobile Call Interception" (PACT) pointed out.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: در این پروتکل‌ها، داده‌های شخصی هویتی هرگز از دستگاه خارج نمی‌شود و همه موارد تطابق در داخل دستگاه رخ می‌دهد.
en-mt: In these protocols, personally identifiable data never leaves the device and all matching occurs within the device.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: «گروه حریم خصوصی» در «آزمایشگاه رسانه MIT» مشغول توسعه SafePaths، پلتفرمی برای استفاده از شیوه‌های حافظ حریم خصوصی در فرآیند جمع‌آوری و مصرف داده‌های مکان‌یابی و مسیریابی، برای رهگیری روند شیوع کووید-19 بوده است.
en-mt: The Privacy Group at the MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving practices in the process of collecting and consuming location and routing data to track the spread of Covid-19.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: این پلتفرم مبتنی بر نتایج پژوهش مندرج در گزارش رسمی «رذالت برنامه‌ها: حفظ حریم خصوصی شخصی در دوران همه‌گیری» که در مارس 2020 منتشر شد، توسعه یافته است.ابتکار مشابه دیگر، پلتفرم SafeTrace محصول Enigma MPC است. این شرکت به توسعه فناوری‌های حریم خصوصی که در «آزمایشگاه رسانه MIT» شکل گرفته است، می‌پردازد.
en-mt: The platform was developed based on the research results contained in the official report "The Mischief of Apps: Protecting Personal Privacy in the Pandemic" published in March 2020. Another similar initiative is Enigma MPC's SafeTrace platform. The company develops privacy technologies developed at the MIT Media Lab.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: SafeTrace با فناوری‌های سخت‌افزاری ایمن به کاربران اجازه می‌دهد که داده‌های حساس مکانی و بهداشتی را، بدون نقض شدن حریم خصوصی داده‌ها، در اختیار دیگر کاربران و مسئولان قرار دهند.
en-mt: With secure hardware technologies, SafeTrace allows users to share sensitive health and location data with other users and authorities without compromising data privacy.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: در 5 آوریل 2020، ائتلاف جهانی TCN به وسیله تعدادی گروه شکل گرفت. این گروه‌ها بر محور آنچه اساساً پروتکل‌های مشابه و عمدتاً همپوشان بود، با هدف کاهش پراکندگی و فراهم کردن زمینه همکاری جهانی در حوزه برنامه‌های رهگیری و هشداردهی، از جنبه‌های کلیدی دستیابی به پذیرش گسترده، گرد هم آمده بودند.
en-mt: On April 5, 2020, the TCN Global Coalition was formed by a number of groups. These groups came together around what were essentially similar and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal of reducing fragmentation and enabling global cooperation in surveillance and warning programs, key aspects of achieving widespread adoption.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: در 9 اوریل 2020، دولت سنگاپور اعلام کرد که پروتکل BlueTrace را که در برنامه رسمی دولت آن به کار رفته بود، در اختیار عموم گذاشته است.
en-mt: On April 9, 2020, the Singapore government announced that it had released the BlueTrace protocol used in its official government program to the public.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: در 10 آوریل 2020، گوگل و اپل، شرکت‌های کنترل‌کننده پلتفرم‌های همراه اندروید و iOS، از یک ابتکار رهگیری تماس رونمایی کردند که به ادعای آنها قرار است حریم خصوصی را حفظ کند. این ابتکار مبتنی بر ترکیب فناوری «انرژی پایین بلوتوث» و رمزنگاری حفظ حریم خصوصی است.
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, unveiled a call tracking initiative that they claim is meant to protect privacy. This initiative is based on the combination of "Bluetooth Low Energy" technology and privacy-preserving encryption.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: آنها مشخصات فناوری‌های اصلی به‌کاررفته در این سامانه را نیز منتشر کرده‌اند.
en-mt: They have also published the specifications of the main technologies used in this system.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: طبق ادعای اپل و گوگل، این سامانه قرار است در سه مرحله راه‌اندازی شود:
en-mt: According to Apple and Google, this system is going to be launched in three stages:

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: معرفی ابزارهای توانمندسازی دولت‌ها برای ایجاد برنامه‌های رهگیری کروناویروس با قابلیت حفظ حریم خصوصی
en-mt: Introducing tools to empower governments to create privacy-friendly coronavirus tracking programs

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: ادغام مستقیم این قابلیت در iOS و اندروید. گوگل و اپل قصد دارند مشکلات پذیرش و نظارت مستمر را با توزیع این سامانه از طریق به‌روزرسانی سیستم عامل و سپس حذف آن به روش مشابه پس از برطرف شدن تهدید، رفع کنند.
en-mt: Direct integration of this feature in iOS and Android. Google and Apple plan to solve the problems of acceptance and continuous monitoring by distributing this system through operating system updates and then removing it in the same way after the threat is eliminated.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: b'جایگزین‌سازی دارو (معروف به تغییر کاربرد، تغییر نمایه، تغییر وظیفه یا جابجایی درمانی دارو) به تغییر کاربرد داروی تاییدشده برای درمان بیماری یا مشکل جسمی متفاوت از آنچه دارو در اصل برای آن توسعه یافته بود، گفته می‌شود.
en-mt: b'Drug substitution (also known as change of use, change of profile, change of function, or therapeutic shift of drug) refers to changing the use of an approved drug to treat a disease or physical problem different from that for which the drug was originally developed.

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: این یک مسیر از پژوهش علمی است که برای توسعه درمان‌های ایمن و موثر کووید-19 اجرا می‌شود.
en-mt: This is a path of scientific research that is being implemented to develop safe and effective treatments for Covid-19.

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: از دیگر اهداف پژوهشی می‌توان به توسعه واکسن کووید-19 و انتقال پلاسمای فرد بهبودیافته اشاره کرد. SARS-CoV-2 دارای حدود 66 پروتئین دارویی است که هریک از آنها چندین محل اتصال لیگاند دارند.
en-mt: Other research goals include the development of a Covid-19 vaccine and the transfer of plasma from a recovered person. SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 pharmacologic proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: تحلیل این محل‌های اتصال طرح معقولی برای توسعه داروی ضدویروس موثر علیه پروتئین‌های کووید-19 ارائه می‌کند.
en-mt: The analysis of these binding sites provides a reasonable plan for the development of an effective antiviral drug against the covid-19 proteins.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: از مهم‌ترین پروتئین‌های هدف SARS-CoV-2 می‌توان به پروتئاز شبه پاپایین، پلیمراز RNA وابسته به RNA، هلیکاز، پروتئین S و ریبوفسفاتاز ADP اشاره کرد.
en-mt: The most important target proteins of SARS-CoV-2 are papain-like protease, RNA-dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, protein S, and ADP ribophosphatase.

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: Hussein A A و همکاران به بررسی چندین داروی پیشنهادی که در آن زمان برای شباهت اسکلتی آنها با شبیه‌ترین داروهای تاییدشده بهینه و تحلیل شده بودند پرداختند تا روند توسعه داروی قدرتمند ضد SARS-CoV-2 در مطالعه پیش‌بالینی که قرار بود در طراحی مطالعه بالینی پیشنهاد شود، سرعت بگیرد.
en-mt: Hussein AA et al reviewed several proposed drugs that were then optimized and analyzed for their skeletal similarity to the most similar approved drugs to advance the development of a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug in a preclinical study that was to be proposed in a clinical study design. speed up

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: کلروکین نوعی داروی ضد مالاریاست که برای درمان برخی بیماری‌های خودایمنی نیز مصرف می‌شود.
en-mt: Chloroquine is an antimalarial drug that is also used to treat some autoimmune diseases.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: در 18 مارس، WHO اعلام کرد که کلروکین و هیدروکسی‌کلروکین مرتبط جزو چهار دارویی هستند که در کارآزمایی بالینی «وحدت» تحت مطالعه قرار گرفته‌اند.
en-mt: On March 18, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related drug hydroxychloroquine were among four drugs being studied in the "Unity" clinical trial.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: Andrew Cuomo، فرماندار نیویورک، اعلام کرد که آزمایش‌های ایالت نیویورک بر روی کلروکین و هیدروکسی‌کلروکین از 24 مارس آغاز خواهد شد. در 28 مارس، FDA استفاده از سولفات هیدروکسی‌کلروکین و فسفات کلروکین را با «مجوز مصرف اضطراری» (EUA) مجاز اعلام کرد.
en-mt: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York state trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine will begin on March 24. On March 28, the FDA approved the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an "Emergency Use Authorization" (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: این درمان در فرآیند کارآزمایی‌های بالینی FDA تایید نشده است و مصرف آن طبق EUA فقط برای درمان آزمایشی و استفاده اضطراری در بیماران بستری که قادر به دریافت دارو در کارآزمایی بالینی نیستند، مجاز شمرده شده است.
en-mt: This treatment has not been approved in the FDA clinical trials process and is only authorized under the EUA for experimental treatment and emergency use in inpatients who are unable to receive drug in a clinical trial.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: CDC اعلام کرده است که «ضرورت مصرف، میزان مصرف یا مدت مصرف هیدروکسی‌کلروکین برای پیشگیری یا درمان عفونت SARS-CoV-2» هنوز مشخص نشده است.
en-mt: The CDC has stated that "the necessity, dose, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for the prevention or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" has not yet been determined.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: پزشکان اعلام کرده‌اند که این داروها را در صورت «نبودن گزینه دیگر» مصرف می‌کنند.
en-mt: Doctors have stated that they use these drugs if there is "no other option".

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: یک گروه پژوهشی در استانبول ترکیه در حال اجرای طرح پژوهشی کوچکی درباره استفاده از کلروکین به همراه روی، ویتامین A، ویتامین C و ویتامین D است.
en-mt: A research group in Istanbul, Turkey, is conducting a small research project on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C, and vitamin D.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: مطالعات گسترده‌ای در دانشگاه دوک و دانشگاه آکسفورد در جریان است.
en-mt: Extensive studies are underway at Duke University and Oxford University.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: دانشکده پزشکی لانگون NYU در حال اجرای یک کارآزمایی درباره ایمنی و اثربخشی مصرف پیشگیرانه هیدروکسی‌کلروکین است.
en-mt: NYU Langone School of Medicine is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of prophylactic hydroxychloroquine.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: کارآزمایی‌های بالینی در ووهان و شن‌ژن چین مدعی شدند که favipiravir «کاملاً موثر» بوده است.
en-mt: Clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen, China claimed that favipiravir was "completely effective".

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: نتیجه آزمایش در 35 بیمار در میانگین 4 روز منفی شد، در‌حالی‌که مدت بیماری در 45 بیماری که آن را دریافت نکرده بودند، 11 روز بود.
en-mt: The test result was negative in 35 patients in an average of 4 days, while the duration of illness in the 45 patients who did not receive it was 11 days.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: در پژوهشی که در ووهان بر روی 240 بیمار مبتلا به ذات الریه انجام گرفت، به نیمی از بیماران favipiravir و به نیمی دیگر umifenovir داده شد.
en-mt: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half of the patients were given favipiravir and the other half were given umifenovir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: «آژانس داروسازی ایتالیا» به مردم یادآوری کرد که شواهد موجود درباره اثربخشی این دارو ناکافی و مقدماتی است.
en-mt: The "Italian Pharmaceutical Agency" reminded the public that the available evidence about the effectiveness of this drug is insufficient and preliminary.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: در 2 آوریل، آلمان اعلام کرد که این دارو را برای ذخیره خود از ژاپن خواهد خرید و از ارتش برای رساندن دارو به بیمارستان‌های آموزشی کمک خواهد گرفت و در آنجا از دارو برای درمان بیماران مبتلا به کووید-19 استفاده خواهد کرد.
en-mt: On April 2, Germany announced that it would buy the drug from Japan for its stockpile and enlist the help of the military to deliver the drug to teaching hospitals, where it will use the drug to treat patients with Covid-19.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: به گزارش South China Morning Post، شینزو آبه پیشنهاد خرید این دارو را به دولت ترامپ ارائه کرده است. این دارو شاید برای درمان موارد حاد بیماری که ویروس در آنها تکثیر شده است، چندان کارآمد نباشد.
en-mt: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has offered to purchase this drug to the Trump administration. This drug may not be very effective for treating acute cases of the disease in which the virus has multiplied.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: استفاده از آن شاید برای زنان باردار یا افرادی که قصد باردار شدن دارند، ایمن نباشد.
en-mt: Its use may not be safe for pregnant women or people who are planning to become pregnant.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: بررسی lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra)، ترکیب ضدویروس‌های lopinavir و ritonavir، مشخص کرد که «فایده‌ای مشاهده نشده است».
en-mt: A review of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, found that "no benefit was observed."

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: این داروها برای پیشگیری از تکثیر HIV از طریق چسبیدن به پروتئاز طراحی شدند.
en-mt: These drugs were designed to prevent HIV replication by binding to the protease.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: گروهی از پژوهشگران دانشگاه کلرادو سعی دارند این داروها را برای یافتن ترکیبی که بتواند به پروتئاز SARS-CoV-2 بچسبد، اصلاح کنند. در جامعه علمی نقدهایی درباره هدایت منابع به سوی تغییر کاربرد داروهایی که مخصوص درمان HIV/ایدز طراحی شده بودند، مطرح شده است.
en-mt: A group of researchers at the University of Colorado is trying to modify these drugs to find a compound that can attach to the SARS-CoV-2 protease. Criticisms have been raised in the scientific community about directing resources towards changing the use of drugs that were specifically designed to treat HIV/AIDS.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: سازمان جهانی بهداشت lopinavir/ritonavir را در کارآزمایی بین‌المللی «وحدت» گنجاند.
en-mt: The World Health Organization included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international "Unity" trial.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: Gilead Sciences داروی Remdesivir را به عنوان درمانی برای بیماری ویروسی ایبولا و عفونت‌های ویروسی ماربورگ توسعه داده بود. Gilead Sciences بعداً تشخیص داد که Remdesivir در محیط آزمایشگاهی علیه ویروس‌های فیلو، پنومو، پارامیکسو و کرونا فعال بوده است.
en-mt: Gilead Sciences had developed Remdesivir as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections. Gilead Sciences later found that remdesivir was active in vitro against filo, pneumo, paramyxo, and corona viruses.

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: یکی از مشکلات درمان ضدویروسی، ایجاد مقاومت از طریق جهش است که ممکن است به بیماری‌های شدیدتر و واگیری منجر شود.
en-mt: One of the problems of antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutation, which may lead to more severe diseases and contagion.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: برخی مطالعات مقدماتی پیش-آزمایشی حاکی از آن است که Remdesivir ممکن است مانع ژنتیکی موثری در برابر شکل‌گیری مقاومت باشد. چندین کارآزمایی بالینی، شامل دو مورد که بیمارستان آموزشی Cleveland مجری آنهاست، در جریان است. یکی افراد دچار بیماری خفیف و دیگری افراد دچار بیماری شدید را شامل می‌شود.
en-mt: Some preliminary pre-trial studies suggest that remdesivir may be an effective genetic barrier against the formation of resistance. Several clinical trials are underway, including two conducted by Cleveland Teaching Hospital. One includes people with mild disease and the other includes people with severe disease.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: سه کارآزمایی بالینی درباره تاثیر تزریق درون-وریدی ویتامین C بر افراد بستری و دچار بیماری شدید کووید-19 در دست اجراست. دو مورد از آنها با دارونما کنترل می‌شود (چین و کانادا) و یک مورد فاقد کنترل است (ایتالیا).
en-mt: Three clinical trials about the effect of intravenous vitamin C injection on hospitalized people with severe covid-19 disease are underway. Two of them are placebo-controlled (China and Canada) and one is uncontrolled (Italy).

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: ایالت نیویورک کارآزمایی‌های مربوط به آزیترومایسین آنتی‌بیوتیک را در 24 مارس 2020 آغاز کرد.
en-mt: New York State began trials of the antibiotic azithromycin on March 24, 2020.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: مرکز ملی بهداشت و پزشکی جهانی ژاپن (NCGM) در حال برنامه‌ریزی برای اجرای کارآزمایی بالینی برای Alvesco تیجین (سیکلسونید)، نوعی کورتیکوسترویید استنشاقی آسم، برای درمان بیماران فاقد نشانه و آلوده به کروناویروس جدید است.
en-mt: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning to conduct a clinical trial for Alvesco tigeine (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, to treat asymptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: نوعی کارآزمایی فاز II درباره آنزیم 2 مبدل آنژیوتانسین شامل 200 بیمار در جریان است. 200 بیمار بستری و بدحال از دانمارک، آلمان و اتریش برای تعیین اثربخشی این درمان در این کارآزمایی شرکت داده می‌شوند.
en-mt: A phase II trial of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 involving 200 patients is ongoing. 200 hospitalized and critically ill patients from Denmark, Germany and Austria will participate in this trial to determine the effectiveness of this treatment.

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: پژوهشگران موسسه قلب مونترال کانادا در حال بررسی نقش کلروکین در کاهش التهاب و پیامدهای تنفسی در بیماران دچار نشانه‌های خفیف کووید-19 هستند.
en-mt: Researchers at the Montreal Heart Institute of Canada are investigating the role of chloroquine in reducing inflammation and respiratory outcomes in patients with mild symptoms of Covid-19.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: در این پژوهش، با عنوان «کولکرونا»، 6000 بیمار حداقل 40 ساله که مبتلا به کووید-19 تشخیص داده شده‌اند و دچار نشانه‌های خفیف و بدون ضرورت بستری هستند، شرکت داده می‌شوند.
en-mt: 6,000 patients at least 40 years old who have been diagnosed with covid-19 and have mild symptoms and do not need to be hospitalized will participate in this research, titled "Colcrona".

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: زنان باردار یا شیرده یا زنانی که از روش‌های موثر پیشگیری از بارداری استفاده می‌کنند، واجد شرایط شرکت در این مطالعه نیستند.
en-mt: Pregnant or lactating women or women using effective contraceptive methods are not eligible to participate in this study.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: چندین داروی انعقاد خون در ایتالیا در دست بررسی است.
en-mt: Several anticoagulants are under investigation in Italy.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: هپارین با وزن مولکولی پایین برای درمان بیماران به طور گسترده مصرف می‌شود و به همین دلیل «آژانس پزشکی ایتالیا» ملزم به انتشار دستورالعمل مصرف آن شده است.
en-mt: Low molecular weight heparin is widely used to treat patients, and for this reason, the "Italian Medical Agency" is required to publish its instructions.

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: خبر مطالعه چند-مرکزی شامل 300 بیمار برای بررسی اثر مصرف انوکساپارین سدیم بر دوز پیشگیری و درمان در 14 آوریل در ایتالیا اعلام شد.
en-mt: The news of a multicenter study including 300 patients to investigate the effect of enoxaparin sodium on preventive and therapeutic doses was announced on April 14 in Italy.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: از آنجا که SARS-CoV-2 نوعی ویروس است، توجه علمی چشمگیری بر تغییر کاربرد داروهای ضدویروسی که برای درمان بیماری‌های واگیر قبلی مانند مرس، سارس و ویروس نیل غربی تولید شده بودند، متمرکز شده است.
en-mt: Because SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, significant scientific attention has focused on changing the use of antiviral drugs that were developed to treat earlier infectious diseases such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Ribavirin: ribavirin طبق رهنمودهای ویراست 7 چین برای درمان کووید-19 پیشنهاد شد
en-mt: Ribavirin: Ribavirin was recommended for the treatment of Covid-19 according to the 7th edition of the Chinese guidelines

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: اومی‌فنوویر: اومی‌فنوویر طبق رهنمودهای ویراست 7 چین برای درمان کووید-19 پیشنهاد شد
en-mt: Omifenovir: Omifenovir was recommended for the treatment of Covid-19 according to the 7th edition of the Chinese guidelines.

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: از آنتی‌بیوتیک‌هایی که به عنوان جایگزین احتمالی درمان‌های کووید-19 مطرح شده‌اند، می‌توان به موارد زیر اشاره کرد:
en-mt: Among the antibiotics that have been proposed as possible alternatives to the treatment of Covid-19, the following can be mentioned:

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: توکیلیزوماب (گیرنده Anti-IL-6): تاییدشده در چین.
en-mt: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved in China.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: همچنین کارآزمایی‌هایی در ایتالیا و چین. و به Tocilizumab#COVID-19 مراجعه کنید.
en-mt: Also trials in Italy and China. And see #Tocilizumab #COVID-19.

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: b'واکسن کووید-19 واکسنی فرضی علیه بیماری کروناویروس 2019 (کووید-19) است.
en-mt: b'Covid-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against the 2019 coronavirus disease (Covid-19).

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: با این که هیچ واکسنی کارآزمایی‌های بالینی را تکمیل نکرده است، تلاش‌های متعددی برای ساخت این واکسن در جریان است.
en-mt: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, several efforts are underway to develop one.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: در اواخر فوریه 2020، سازمان بهداشت جهانی (WHO) اعلام کرد که انتظار ندارد که واکسن SARS-CoV-2، ویروس عامل، زودتر از 18 ماه آینده در دسترس قرار بگیرد.
en-mt: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) announced that it did not expect a vaccine for SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to be available earlier than the next 18 months.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: پنج واکسن پیشنهادی در آوریل تحت مطالعات ایمنی فاز I بودند.
en-mt: Five proposed vaccines were undergoing phase I safety studies in April.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: کووید-19 در دسامبر 2019 شناسایی شد.
en-mt: Covid-19 was identified in December 2019.

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: شیوع گسترده جهانی در 2020 رخ داد و منجر به سرمایه‌گذاری و فعالیت پژوهشی چشمگیر برای ساخت واکسن شد.
en-mt: A large global outbreak occurred in 2020, leading to significant investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: بسیاری از سازمان‌ها از ژنوم‌های منتشرشده برای تولید واکسن احتمالی علیه SARS-CoV-2 استفاده می‌کنند.
en-mt: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop a possible vaccine against SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: در آوریل اعلام شد که الزامات ابتکار CEPI برای توسعه واکسن عبارت‌اند از سرعت، ظرفیت تولید، استقرار در مقیاس و دسترسی سراسری.
en-mt: It was announced in April that CEPI's requirements for vaccine development were speed, production capacity, deployment at scale and nationwide access.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: در آوریل، دانشمندان CEP اعلام کردند که 10 پلتفرم فناوری مختلف در اوایل 2020 برای تولید واکسن موثر علیه کووید-19 تحت بررسی و توسعه هستند.
en-mt: In April, CEP scientists announced that 10 different technology platforms are under investigation and development in the early 2020s to produce an effective vaccine against Covid-19.

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: اهداف پلتفرم اصلی که وارد مطالعات ایمنی فاز I شده‌اند، عبارت‌اند از:
en-mt: The main platform targets that have entered Phase I safety studies are:

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: اسید نوکلئیک (DNA و RNA) (توسعه‌دهنده فاز I و واکسن پیشنهادی: مدرنا، mRNA-1273)
en-mt: Nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and proposed vaccine: Moderna, mRNA-1273)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: ناقل ویروسی (توسعه‌دهنده فاز I و واکسن پیشنهادی: CanSino Biologics، ناقل آدنوویروس نوع 5)
en-mt: Viral vector (Phase I developer and proposed vaccine: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: طبق اعلام دانشمندان CEPI در آوریل، مجموعاً 115 واکسن پیشنهادی در مراحل اولیه توسعه هستند، 78 مورد از آنها به عنوان پروژه فعال تایید شده‌اند (79، طبق اعلام موسسه Milken) و 37 مورد دیگر علنی شده‌اند ولی اطلاعات چندانی از آنها در دسترس عموم نیست (فرض بر این است که در مرحله برنامه‌ریزی یا طراحی هستند).
en-mt: According to CEPI scientists in April, a total of 115 proposed vaccines are in early stages of development, 78 of which have been approved as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute) and another 37 have been announced but little information is publicly available. (It is assumed that they are in the planning or design stage).

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: کارآزمایی فاز I-II به بررسی مقدماتی ایمنی و ایمن‌زایی می‌پردازد، معمولاً تصادفی و کنترل‌شده با دارونماست، در مراکز مختلف اجرا می‌شود و دوزهای دقیق‌تر و موثرتر را تعیین می‌کند.
en-mt: A phase I-II trial is a preliminary study of safety and immunogenicity, usually randomized and placebo-controlled, conducted at different centers and determining more precise and effective doses.

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: کارآزمایی‌های فاز III معمولاً شرکت‌کنندگان بیشتری شامل یک گروه کنترل دارند و ضمن بررسی اثربخشی واکسن برای پیشگیری از بیماری، به پایش عوارض نامطلوب در دوز بهینه می‌پردازند.
en-mt: Phase III trials usually have larger participants, include a control group, and monitor the vaccine's effectiveness for disease prevention while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: از 79 واکسن پیشنهادی در مرحله توسعه فعال (تاییدشده تا اوایل آوریل 2020)، 74 مورد هنوز بر روی انسان آزمایش نشده‌اند (هنوز در مرحله پژوهش «پیش‌بالینی» هستند).
en-mt: Of the 79 proposed vaccines in active development (approved as of early April 2020), 74 have not yet been tested in humans (they are still in "preclinical" research).

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: در حدود 24 ژانویه 2020 در استرالیا، دانشگاه کویینزلند اعلام کرد که در حال تحقیق بر روی قابلیت واکسن بست مولکولی برای اصلاح ژنتیکی پروتئین‌های ویروسی و شبیه‌سازی واکنش ایمنی است.
en-mt: Around January 24, 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is researching the ability of a molecular vaccine to genetically modify viral proteins and simulate an immune response.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: در حدود 24 ژانویه 2020 در کانادا، «مرکز بین‌المللی واکسن» (VIDO-InterVac) در دانشگاه ساسکاچوان از آغاز تحقیق بر روی واکسنی خبر داد که قرار است آزمایش‌های انسانی آن در سال 2021 شروع شود.
en-mt: Around January 24, 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Center (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the start of research on a vaccine that is scheduled to begin human trials in 2021.

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: طرحهای توسعه واکسن در «مرکز کنترل و پیشگیری بیماری چین» در 26 ژانویه 2020 و در دانشگاه هنگ‌کنگ در 28 ژانویه معرفی شدند.
en-mt: Vaccine development plans were presented at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on January 26, 2020 and at the University of Hong Kong on January 28.

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: در حدود 29 ژانویه 2020، شرکت‌های داروسازی Janssen، با مدیریت Hanneke Schuitemaker، اعلام کرد که فرآیند توسعه واکسن را آغاز کرده است.
en-mt: Around January 29, 2020, Janssen Pharmaceuticals, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun the process of developing a vaccine.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: Janssen، با همکاری شریک زیست‌فناوری خود، Vaxart، در حال توسعه واکسن خوراکی است.
en-mt: Janssen, in collaboration with its biotech partner, Vaxart, is developing an oral vaccine.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: در 18 مارس 2020، Emergent BioSolutions از همکاری تولیدی با Vaxart برای توسعه واکسن خبر داد.
en-mt: On March 18, 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart for vaccine development.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: در 8 فوریه 2020، آزمایشگاه OncoGen در رومانی با انتشار مقاله‌ای از طراحی واکسنی با فناوری مشابه با واکسن مورد استفاده برای درمان نئو آنتی ژن سرطان، خبر داد.
en-mt: On February 8, 2020, the OncoGen laboratory in Romania announced the design of a vaccine with the same technology as the vaccine used to treat neo-antigen cancer.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: در 25 مارس، رئیس این موسسه پژوهشی اعلام کرد که کار ساخت واکسن را به پایان رسانده‌اند و در ابتدای مرحله آزمایش هستند.
en-mt: On March 25, the head of this research institute announced that they have completed the work of making the vaccine and are at the beginning of the testing phase.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: در 27 فوریه 2020، شرکت NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology، از شرکت‌های تابعه Generex، اعلام کرد که طرحی را برای تولید واکسن پپتید li-Key علیه کووید-19 آغاز کرده است.
en-mt: On February 27, 2020, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, a subsidiary of Generex, announced that it has initiated a plan to develop a li-Key peptide vaccine against Covid-19.

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: آنها قصد داشتند واکسنی تولید کنند که بتوان آن را «ظرف 90 روز» بر روی انسان آزمایش کرد.
en-mt: They planned to develop a vaccine that could be tested on humans "within 90 days."

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: در 5 مارس 2020، دانشگاه واشنگتن در سنت‌لوییز از طرحهای خود برای توسعه واکسن خبر داد.
